product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: One of the products I am pleased with!
review_text: I bought the Shampoo Theory and Condition Theory and this Redo Freshen-Up Mist. I have normal-type hair that needs to be washed every other day -- and if I use a lot of product, it needs to be washed every day. I have very sensitive skin too. This mist worked very well on my hair, definitely freshened it up and allowed me to restyle it with a quick blow dry. And it feels awesome on my skin. Well done, Jonathan

product_name: Jonathan Product Beauty Water Shower Purification System(TM): Beauty
title: Just buy the Aquasana cause that's what it is
review_text: If Jonathan wants to sell environmentally concious products he should promote it in his other hairstyling products. The aquasana shower filter  is an excellent product which i use .Whats it matter who's name is on it. It is what it is and it will leave your skin and hair feeling fresher.

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Add Moisture Moisturizing Conditoner(TM): Beauty
title: Smells really good
review_text:
Well first off, I'm a guy with very short hair...so I don't know whether or not it really works. But I'm bored and decided to rate it anyway. So here goes:

Cons

Conditioner is really thick and difficult to get out of the bottle. The best solution for this is to let the bottle sit upside down. 

Pros

Smells DAMN good. I'm not a big fan of fruity/coconut aromas, but I like this particular smell so much that I might need to go to rehab sometime in the future. 


Bottom Line: Although this conditioner is difficult to get out of the bottle, it smells really good. Whether or not it will work for your hair, the only way to know is to try it. And even if ot doesn't work for your hair...it's worth the 20 bucks just to open it up and smell it every now and then. =)

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Curl Curling Serum(TM): Beauty
title: SWEET CANDY
review_text:
I LOVE JONATHAN PRODUCTS.  AND ESPECIALLY HOW IT MAKES MY HAIR
FEEL, SO SOFT AND SEXY LOOKING.  KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK JONATHAN

product_name: Jonathan Product Finish Hold Firm Hold Spray(R): Beauty
title: The perfect  hair spray
review_text: Finish firm hold spray is absolutely perfect for my needs.  It has a firm hold yet isn't heavy or "hard". I don't have a complicated hair style but my hair tends to go flat after just a few hours.  This product prevents that

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Add Moisture Moisturizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: The best shampoo EVER!
review_text: This is absolutely the greatest shampoo ever! I've been abusing my hair for at least 30 years, and I have never had my hair looking and feeling as healthy as it does now. There is no better product for your hair on the market. All others are full of damaging detergents and chemicals with a dose of silicone thrown in to make you think your hair is clean, but you're killing it. I admire Jonathan for not treating us like idiots by being THE ONLY shampoo that doesn't tell you to lather, shampoo, and rinse twice, but you do need to. And you need to use no more than a dime-size amount of the Jonathan conditioner. My hair has never looked or felt so good

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Add Moisture Moisturizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Very Picky
review_text: Very picky about shampoo and this a really good for dry color treated hair.  I can tell it has made a difference

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Love Jonathan Create Volume Thickening Foam
review_text: It's the best product I've used to create volume and hold.  I didn't notice it after blow drying, but, while using the curling iron and styling - my hair had a lot more volume and great hold.  I have straight, fine, limp hair and it is very difficult to get it to hold a style.  I truely noticed a big difference.  I plan to purchase the other volumizing products, once they are in stock.

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: I love it!
review_text: I have tried just about every hair product on the market and this very much surpassed my expectations! I wasn't sure when I put it in my hair, but as I was styling it, I was amazed. It created a lot of volume and my hair stayed shiny. I am ready to try the rest of the product line

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: The best styling tool available
review_text: This works great on short and long hair and you can use wet or dry. I have long hair and I love using this product. It works great for those evenings after a long day and you want to give your hair new life. Fantastic

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: Good for thick curly hair
review_text:
I used this product this morning for the first time.  I washed my hair, blew it dry, most of the way, then rubbed the product in my hands and lightly distributed it throughout my hair.  The best way for me to describe it, is that, it is like a creamy hairspray.  Yes, it is tacky, like hairspray can be, but that's how it helps you get the style you want.  What I like about how it works on my hair, is that it really tamed the frizzes and brought down the "big" hair look that I usually have after blowing my thick hair dry.  I think it would also work well on the days that I blow my hair out.  I would probably blow it out first, then apply some dirt to help tame and smooth it.  I can see where it might make thinner, straighter hair a bit limp, so be careful not to use very much.

Edit:  I think it is best to apply to slightly damp hair, that might help with the people that are having trouble applying it to completely dry hair

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Money well Spent!
review_text:
I have been reading about this miracle hair dryer for months in the beauty magazines I read, so I will admit I was very excited to pruchase it. The results however will amaze even the most cynical consumer. My hair has never looked so good when styled at home. True, it looks about the same as what my hairstylist does, but to me that is well worth the moderately high price tag. It was a good buy for me because I spend a lot of money buying a variety of cremes and glosses to make my hair pretty, and now I know it wasn't the products I put in that made my hair look bad, it was the dryer.I was so surprised to notice that even the ends of my hair were shiny, and my ends are sooo fried. The difference is astounding. 

I bought this dryer in a package with the babyliss straightener, and I would definately recommend that to anyone wanting to buy this dryer. For the same price you can get a free straightener. (A very good one!)

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Motion Shaping Creme Gel(R): Beauty
title: Expensive but good
review_text:
Its pretty expensive for gel but I like it.
My hair doesn't get rock hard like other gels and holds pretty well throughout the day

product_name: Too Faced Fat Kiss: Beauty
title: Smells Great Feels Great
review_text: Its good for waking up, because once you put it on you feel refreshed because your lips feel on fire.I like the sting and  the shine of it. It finishes pretty fast and the roll ball may feel like a little drag to keep rolling on the lips, but i think it's worth trying it unless you have extreme sensitive lips, this stuff is strong. Did i mention the great smell? Yum! Me and my boyfriend loved it.

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Straighten Or Curl Iron: Beauty
title: Great tool for waving!
review_text: I just got this item (from ebay, it's cheaper)and feel it's worthy of praise.  I have thick, straight hair, and bought this product to wave my hair.  I haven't figured out how it curls, but to wave it's incredibly easy!  Grab your hair from the root and twist outward and it waves nice and fast w/o burning your hair like a curling iron would.  Also w/ a curling iron, it's difficult to wave the top close to the roots.   It heats fast!  and comes w/ a nice pouch so that you can put it away before it cools.

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Straighten Or Curl Iron: Beauty
title: Wonderful Flat Iron!  Great Alternative To The Famous Chi
review_text:
I had the Chi Turbo (1"), but I got worried after reading some reviews about it being unreliable.  So part of the reason I wanted to buy the T3 iron was that it comes with a 4-YEAR comprehensive warranty.  The other difference is that the solid-ceramic plates are "infused" with tourmaline which I found intriguing.

1-3/8" wide plates are the perfect width for my long-ish hair.  (I've used a 2 inch wide iron, which I found harder to maneuver.)  It heats up fast, and stays hot.  It does a great job gripping the hair without snagging.  My hair stays silky and straight all day, and does not feel damaged after a while, like it did with cheaper irons I've used in the past.

Another thing that this iron does that other irons do not do as well - it really curls.  It has heat vents along the sides of the plates that lets you curl your hair by twisting it near the root and pulling it through (different from the usual method of gripping the ends of the strands and then winding up).  It creates a springy curl better than any flat iron I've used.  (However, the heating vents make the exterior of the iron hotter to the touch.  So there is a drawback to this function.)

Overall, I enjoy using this flat iron.  Very happy with this purchase.

ETA: I've learned that HairArt will not honor the warranty unless you buy it from an authorized distributor (e.g., Sephora). So you might want to check that before you place your order

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Straighten Or Curl Iron: Beauty
title: Amazing!!!
review_text: T3 is worth every penny. It is very easy to handle . My hair is soft and shiny. No more frizz. It cut straightening time to half. No hair pulling and it is lightweight. PLUS 2 YEARS of WARRANTY hellooo!!!  Bye bye Chi

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: I have no idea what half you people are talking about
review_text:
After watching Blow Out and seeing how passionate Jonathan was about his product, he sold me. Anyone who is that determined to make the best product on the market, obviously will do whatever it takes to make it happen.
After seeing how much the product was, I cringed at the fact that a bottle of shampoo would be that much. I later, literally dragged myself to Sephora to purchase this shampoo/conditioner after knowing that I was willing to take a risk that could eventually end up in my closet.
I bought it, went straight to my bathroom, and washed my hair. The shampoo did not lather, which I expected considering there is no harsh detergents or sodium lauryl sulfate. The conditioner was a very light, thin substance. Definitely not thick. 
Finale-Dried my hair, and right there, I knew that this product is definitely the BEST hair product BY FAR, that I have ever used. My hair, is very damaged, brittle and FULL of split ends. This product made my hair, very very full, FULL of shine, and very soft. My hair was beautiful for days....
Last test.. going to work. As soon as I put my hair down from a pony tail (I'm a waitress), INSTANTLY everyone noticed my hair. They asked "what did you do?? your hair is soo beautiful".. I told them "40 dollar shampoo and conditioner" WELL WORTH THE COST. Definitely a salon in a bottle. Now my worst fear is that it will be discontinued for any reason. And if so, I am willing spend 1k to stock up and save as much as I can. There is no other product like it

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Works Great
review_text: After reading the other reviews I was a little worried about using the product I had already ordered.  After using it for a few days now my hair has never looked better, I truly feel like this shampoo/conditioner was meant for me.  I have fine, super straight hair, middle to short.  It feels clean and sleek. The conditioner smells like pina coloda, yum!  I would definatly recommend this for my hair type.  Would maybe recommend to lather the shampoo in your hands first then work thoroughly( it doesn't lather as well as some shampoos that have lots of glycerine in them) and only apply the conditioner towards the end of your hair and leave in for a few min.  Hope that helps

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Leave-In Gloss Creme: Beauty
title: Finally, I Just washed my hair and I CAN do something with it!
review_text: I thought I was just going to have to put up with fly-away hair the rest of my life.  This product is not for baby fine hair that goes limp when anything touches it.  It's serious taming for seriously stubborn, coarse, or frizzy hair.  Mine falls into the first two categories.  Don't use too much!  I use it after I've dried some of the moisture out with light blow drying then gently sweep it through my hair - even combing it gently in to reach every strand.  For the first time in years my razor-cut layered hair is smooth

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Leave-In Gloss Creme: Beauty
title: USE... SPARINGLY
review_text: LIKE ANY OTHER LEAVE-in creme, conditioner, ANYTHING, if you PUT TOO MUCH OF IT ON, it WILL attract  DIRT.  I know this because I have baby fine hair and had to model in the DRY DRY deserts in the middle of summer.  Needed ANYTHING leave-in to keep my staticy hair down.  Yes, the more you use, to more dirty you get....  (but in photos you can't really see this, but it felt nasty!)    SO.  Wash your hair.   Well.  Condition.  Towel dry.  APPLY SPARINGLY.  Like a TOUCH.  And smooth into hair. It's not rocket science.  If you need a little more later, add a little more

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Excellent highlighter for porcelain skin
reviewer_location: it'll look like you have pink nail polish on your face
review_text: High Beam is a nice subtle highlighter. However, be sure to blend it very quickly and well or it will look unnatural in certain lighting (it'll look like you have pink nail polish on your face). It also has a tendency to emphasize pores. So only use it on areas of your face where you don't have any, like on the top of the cheek bone and under your eyebrows.

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Great Product - Adds a glow to the cheeks
review_text: High Beam provides a glow or sheen, where as my cheeks seem dull. It does not look greasy...I would say it makes the skin look healthy and vibrant

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Wet or Dry Iron: Beauty
title: Worth Every Penny
review_text: This dry iron is absolutely amazing, I really can't say enough about it. Great for ALL TYPES of hair! It heats up in just seconds and what would take almost 2hrs to blow dry my hair now takes less than half the time. Plus your hair comes out extremely straight. Highly recommend to anyone who wants their hair to look great but doesnt have the time or energy to sit in a hair salon for hours. It is an investment in your hair, one of the better ones I've made.

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Angle Shaping Gel(R): Beauty
title: good motion and hold
review_text: I don't know what the complaints about this product are.  It seems that people are trying to use it for extreme hold hairstyles.  This is not the purpose of this product.  I use it for my short haircut to make the ends stay spiky and styled out, and it works WONDERFULLY.  No matter how much you move your head, it stays in place, but somehow moves enough to keep you from having a stiff look.  And, when you brush your hair out at the end of the day, it feels like you never put it in.  Hair stays soft and feels clean.  The reason why this gel is thinner is that it isn't as sticky or goopey in your hair as other gels.  And it spreads out easier

product_name: Jonathan Product Beauty Water Shower Purification System(TM): Beauty
title: So far, so good!
review_text: I purchased a Beauty Water Shower Purification System and have used it about 5 times now with fantastic results. I have very hard water in my home and am tired of constantly having to blow dry my hair or having to use tons of products for it to be manageable and not frizzy.  My hair felt very soft and manageable using this product and I am hoping it helps my highlights last longer.  I did not experience that 'slimy' feeling people usually associate with soft water.  I'm even able to let my hair air dry and not be frizzy with this product.  I am curious to see how long this filter lasts.  I called Jonathan Products and was told that they do have a replacement filter that costs $55 so you can save a bit of money when you need to replace the filter

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Add Moisture Moisturizing Conditoner(TM): Beauty
title: Was skeptical, big fan now!!
review_text: I watched Blow Out and figured the product was flying off the shelves because of the show's popularity.  I ordered some because the ingredients sounded nice, plus he did seem sincere when formulating, etc.  I have blonde hair, color treated, thick, long lengths.  I've bought high-end hair products for 20 yrs from beauty salons and stores and have never used anything that made my hair feel like Jonathan Product.  You can immediately tell it's stripping and cleansing your hair.  Then, the conditioner,  with it's exotic fragrance,  is the most wonderful conditioning treatment I've ever used.  My hair looks cleaner and has more body than ever before with just shampoo & conditioner.  I'll use it as long as it's available to me

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional X-Large Barrel Brush: Beauty
title: A necessity for girls who blow (hair out)!
review_text: I absolutely love this hairbrush! I have curly hair and like to blow it out often and until now I have not been impressed with any brushes. This brush holds the hair in pace when blowing dry and also lets you move it with your hair and dose not hurt as some can or get stuck. You will not be sorry if you are looking for the perfect brush to go with your perfect dryer (the featherweight)! Oh another thing I like is it extremely easy to keep clean.

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Motion Shaping Creme Gel(R): Beauty
title: Expensive but good
review_text:
Its pretty expensive for gel but I like it.
My hair doesn't get rock hard like other gels and holds pretty well throughout the day

product_name: Too Faced Fat Kiss: Beauty
title: Smells Great Feels Great
review_text: Its good for waking up, because once you put it on you feel refreshed because your lips feel on fire.I like the sting and  the shine of it. It finishes pretty fast and the roll ball may feel like a little drag to keep rolling on the lips, but i think it's worth trying it unless you have extreme sensitive lips, this stuff is strong. Did i mention the great smell? Yum! Me and my boyfriend loved it.

product_name: Too Faced Fat Kiss: Beauty
title: The Uber Gloss
review_text: As a lip gloss addict, I have easily over 200+ glosses. Too Faced Fat Kiss is by far one of my favorites. The superb shine makes my lips look so good! Although it doesn't really plump, it still tastes like cinnamon, and it will warm you up in winter. I have two different colors, because I like it so much! I strongly reccomend getting a couple, so you can keep them in your purse, make up bag, car...Everywhere! This rocks sooo much

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Add Moisture Moisturizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Very impressive :-)
review_text:
Well I am very impressed with this.  I also have tried so many different shampoos and this is one of the best, if not the best, I've used.  I say that because whether I straighten my hair or leave it curly, this shampoo makes it feel and look and smell great.  It feels so nice and clean.  I don't rinse twice with this because it's unnessesary.  
I tried this because of watching Blow Out and on my last trip to America I bought a couple of bottles.  It's one of the best purchases I made.  Most girls buy shampoos etc based on packaging and smell and let me tell you, not only does it look and smell great, but what it does for your hair is amazing and apparently it's very low in damaging chemicals.  I won't hesitate to buy more of Jonathan's products next time I go.  I love this and can't say enough about it

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Add Moisture Moisturizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Very Picky
review_text: Very picky about shampoo and this a really good for dry color treated hair.  I can tell it has made a difference

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: Very good :-)
review_text: This is the second product of Jonathan's I've used and I'm equally happy with it.  I have thin hair when it's straight, and something in the middle when it's curly.  Either way, I'd like it thicker, and this foam certainly helps.  It's great and I've found it does what it promises.  It smells good and you don't need to use too much.  It feels nice in my hair and the fragrance lasts most of the day.  It doesn't matter if your hair is curly or straight, hopefully you will find this as effective and as helpful as I have

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Volume Thickening Foam(TM): Beauty
title: It smells GREAT !
review_text: It has a clean soap smell! I also recommend the volume shampoo & conditioner it made my hair feel very soft

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Straighten Or Curl Iron: Beauty
title: Great tool for waving!
review_text: I just got this item (from ebay, it's cheaper)and feel it's worthy of praise.  I have thick, straight hair, and bought this product to wave my hair.  I haven't figured out how it curls, but to wave it's incredibly easy!  Grab your hair from the root and twist outward and it waves nice and fast w/o burning your hair like a curling iron would.  Also w/ a curling iron, it's difficult to wave the top close to the roots.   It heats fast!  and comes w/ a nice pouch so that you can put it away before it cools.

product_name: Jonathan Product Shampoo Serious Volume Volumizing Shampoo(TM): Beauty
title: Love this product!
review_text: I have been using the volumizing shampoo and conditioner for 2 weeks.  I love this product!  No build up, No dandruf.  Make sure your hair is wet, not just damp, and you should not have a "lathering problem".  I purchased this from QVC and I will definately be a repeat customer.  I have short hair, so this will last me a while.  I loved it so much I bought some for my daughter.  This is my new shampoo

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text:
I love the Benefit line, everything I have tried works great (not to mention they have great packaging and catchy names for all their products!). 

That said, High Beam is simply amazing. It only takes a little dab to add a nice glow/shimmer to my face. I especially like to use it on the cheek bones as it leaves a nice soft glow. High Beam works so much better for me than other products I've tried that either left my skin sticky or chalky. Not to mention those other products cost a lot more!

If you are looking for a little glow, a little shimmer, High Beam is the answer

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Great Product - Adds a glow to the cheeks
review_text: High Beam provides a glow or sheen, where as my cheeks seem dull. It does not look greasy...I would say it makes the skin look healthy and vibrant

product_name: Benefit High Beam: Beauty
title: Amazing Product
review_text: I recently discovered Benefit products. This is a great product if you want to add a little glow to your skin. I use it to highlight my cheek bones. You can use it any where you want a glance to linger. The best thing about this product is the smallest amount makes a big difference in your skin. I suggest you try this product. It works wonders.

product_name: T3 Tourmaline Professional Ionic Wet or Dry Iron: Beauty
title: Worth Every Penny
review_text: This dry iron is absolutely amazing, I really can't say enough about it. Great for ALL TYPES of hair! It heats up in just seconds and what would take almost 2hrs to blow dry my hair now takes less than half the time. Plus your hair comes out extremely straight. Highly recommend to anyone who wants their hair to look great but doesnt have the time or energy to sit in a hair salon for hours. It is an investment in your hair, one of the better ones I've made.

product_name: American Crew Fiber: Beauty
title: Excellent hold and no gloss
review_text: I am a big fan of this product.  My hair is very strong.  It needs a product which can keep it tamed.  However, most products that have that level of strength also come with high sheen or gloss which, in my opinion, is a bad look for today's fashions.  The matte look is more flexible.  American Crew Fiber gives me pliability and a matte look with a very strong hold.  It also smells nice.... not to strong and not too girly

product_name: American Crew Fiber: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text:
I have been using this product for over 5 years as an alternative to gel or bed head.  The results are great. No unwated shine, no gooiness, very easy to wash off. 
Your hair wont feel stiff and wont get damaged. Reasonably priced and more available every day.

product_name: American Crew Fiber: Beauty
title: Smells good, goes far.
review_text: This is a great product for getting the bed head look.  I can use approximately a dime size worth in my palms and go wild!  Trust me, the results are great.  If you apply too much, you're hair will get oily. The good thing is that this product washes out easily with any Shampoo

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: It's all I use now
review_text: This stuff is great.  I used to buy new gels, pommades, pastes, etc. every month because I could never find one that worked exactly how I wanted it to.  But I first tried this a year ago and it's all I've used since.  And it lasts a long time, so don't be afraid of the price.  One container lasts me about 6 months, so you only have to buy it twice a year.  I'll be ordering my third order of it soon

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: new hair style, new styling product
review_text: I just had my fine, processed hair cut into a short layered wedge.  It was shoulder length before and I used a Revlon thermal-air styler to make it acceptable.  After using Dirt, I no longer have to spend ANY time styling it!!  I just blow dry, scrunching my hair with my fingers and when almost dry, I turn my head upside-down and apply about a dime size amount of Dirt into the roots. Flip up and I'm ready to go all in less than 3 minutes.  I find it important to rub Dirt between my palms to warm it up before applying.  Use a little first...you can always add more. It gave my hair great body and control. Hope this product works for you too

product_name: Jonathan Product Dirt Texturizing Paste(R): Beauty
title: The best styling tool available
review_text: This works great on short and long hair and you can use wet or dry. I have long hair and I love using this product. It works great for those evenings after a long day and you want to give your hair new life. Fantastic

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: big improvement over regular dryers
review_text: I have long, thick, wavy hair that loves to frizz up.  I have tried every anti-frizz, hairstyling product out there, and they either didn't work or weighed my hair down.  I didn't want to like this hair dryer and was hoping it wouldn't live up to the hype... BUT, it's excellent on my hair.  After using the dryer (with no styling product) my hair was straight, shiny and felt great.  For me, it didn't change the amount of time I dried my hair, so if your considering buying it for speed, don't, unless you have thin or short hair.  Is it worth the $200.00 price tag?  Depends on you personally, but I recommend you shop around because there are better deals out there

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Money well Spent!
review_text:
I have been reading about this miracle hair dryer for months in the beauty magazines I read, so I will admit I was very excited to pruchase it. The results however will amaze even the most cynical consumer. My hair has never looked so good when styled at home. True, it looks about the same as what my hairstylist does, but to me that is well worth the moderately high price tag. It was a good buy for me because I spend a lot of money buying a variety of cremes and glosses to make my hair pretty, and now I know it wasn't the products I put in that made my hair look bad, it was the dryer.I was so surprised to notice that even the ends of my hair were shiny, and my ends are sooo fried. The difference is astounding. 

I bought this dryer in a package with the babyliss straightener, and I would definately recommend that to anyone wanting to buy this dryer. For the same price you can get a free straightener. (A very good one!)

product_name: T3 Featherweight Tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer: Beauty
title: Lovely Tresses
review_text:
I had stopped using a regular hair dryer a few of months ago as I felt that my hair was becoming brittle and looking damaged.  However air drying my hair seemed to take forever. It was then that I heard about the T3 tourmaline Professional Ionic Hair Dryer from my hairdresser.  Initially the $200 price tag did put me off and I pushed the idea aside. But somehow it remained somewhere in the corner of my mind and one fine day after getting late for a meeting yet again, I decided to bite the bullet and buy the hairdryer. 

And I tell you, I have never been happier using a hair dryer. My hair started looking better and less damaged in the first few weeks itself. It has become smooth and silky and has a healthy glow.  Though the weight and the time taken were almost similar to my old model, the after effect is worth the price paid. The product does come with a 4-year warranty which is an added advantage to justify the exorbitant price. Though the sales brochures uses a lot of scientific terms like ionic mineral and blah... blah... I am not going to bother about it much as far as my hair appears healthy and saves me time so that I don't have to deal with being late for meetings. I   recommend this product to all who would love to have a mane to be proud of

product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: GREAT product!
review_text: This is a great idea for a product! For those of you who don't wash your hair every day, this is a great way to keep it looking and smelling fresh on days you don't wash it. I used this after 5 days without washing, and while it might have worked better within 3 or 4 days, it still freshened my hair and made it beautiful! Well done

product_name: Jonathan Product Redo Freshen-Up Mist For Hair & Skin(R): Beauty
title: One of the products I am pleased with!
review_text: I bought the Shampoo Theory and Condition Theory and this Redo Freshen-Up Mist. I have normal-type hair that needs to be washed every other day -- and if I use a lot of product, it needs to be washed every day. I have very sensitive skin too. This mist worked very well on my hair, definitely freshened it up and allowed me to restyle it with a quick blow dry. And it feels awesome on my skin. Well done, Jonathan

product_name: Jonathan Product Create Angle Shaping Gel(R): Beauty
title: good motion and hold
review_text: I don't know what the complaints about this product are.  It seems that people are trying to use it for extreme hold hairstyles.  This is not the purpose of this product.  I use it for my short haircut to make the ends stay spiky and styled out, and it works WONDERFULLY.  No matter how much you move your head, it stays in place, but somehow moves enough to keep you from having a stiff look.  And, when you brush your hair out at the end of the day, it feels like you never put it in.  Hair stays soft and feels clean.  The reason why this gel is thinner is that it isn't as sticky or goopey in your hair as other gels.  And it spreads out easier

product_name: Jonathan Product Condition Serious Volume Volumizing Conditioner(TM): Beauty
title: Great product
review_text: I got a sample of this conditioner when I bought a similar product by another company.  I didn't care for the one I purchased, but the sample was awesome and I am going to buy the Jonathan conditioner.  I have always had fine limp hair and tried lots of volume products.  I used this for a week and this is the only thing I have ever seen any kind of difference with.  I love it!

product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Recovery Complex 0.5 oz: Beauty
title: a very good cream
review_text: Its effect very much depends on the climate you live in. If you live in a colder and dry climate, especially during winter it does exactly as it promises - great moisturizer, lines are diminished, as is puffiness. I really love using it - I am 35 and currently living in a cold and dry climate. But in hot and sometims humid climates, or during summer it just doesn't work as well - I don't know why. I like it a lot and this is my 3rd bottle, although I am using it as a seasonal eye care

product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Recovery Complex 0.5 oz: Beauty
title: Velvety smooth eyes
review_text: I couldn't say if this diminished wrinkles or puffyness, but it's fab for great feeling eyes, the whole area is velvety smooth and skin feels as soft as silk

product_name: Creative Nail Design Stickey: Beauty
title: The only way to keep my polish on!
review_text: I never wanted to waste my money on a manicure, because my polish would be chipping/peeling by the next day.  My pedicurist bet me that she could keep the polish on my manicure by using this stuff, and low and behold...it worked!  It kept the polish on for a week even through housecleaning and a trip to Vegas

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Jumbo Sharpener: Beauty
title: Not all Sharpeners are Created Equal
review_text: Sounds like a pitch but something about benefits sharpeners has obviously been designed better to sharpen without the usual amount of waste. These are all I can use anymore.

product_name: Chanel No. 22 by Chanel for Women 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: A FLORAL FOR ALL SEASONS
review_text:
Cold weather will be with us for a while and nothing makes one feel warmer than being wrapped in a delicious flowery fragrance - that certainly is Chanel No. 22. It's a blend of white flowers that has resulted in a scent which is both sweetly innocent and sensuous. 

Continuing in their use of symbolism and numbers after the overwhelming success of Chanel No. 5, Coco Chanel and Ernest Beaux developed yet another fragrance, naming it No. 22 for the year it was presented. 

It may have been created in 1922 but it's as up to the minute as tomorrow, especially in the new spray.

product_name: Still Life Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Summery Sunflower Bath
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The Still Life bath bomb contains pretty sunflower petals that make this a summery bath experience. To be truthful, after putting this in the bath I walked away and came back into the room, wondering who was eating Fruit Loops! That is the scent of this "fun to take a bath before breakfast" experience. 

The fresh scent of Lemon and Sweet Wild Orange mingles with Bergamot and Gardenia extract. The result of this bath is a refreshing - I can face the day feeling. If you want to enhance the experience, try the Happy Hippy shower gel with grapefruit. The I Love Juicy Shampoo and Veganese Conditioner also complete the citrus experience. 

If you think the petals in this bath bombs are fun (the ones in my bath slipped right down the drain), wait until you try the Big Blue experience with seaweed. It does take an adventurous spirit to try some of these items, but as an official LUSH addict, I tend to dive into the experiences with abandon. You may also love Golden Slumbers (lavender and Neroli), Sex Bomb (Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Clary Sage), Romance In A Stone (Wild Orange, Mandarin & Tangarine). 

Onward to try Tisty Toasty which I hear is a bit of a 
love spell style bath with rose petals.  

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Relastin Revitalizing Kit: Beauty
title: Relastin Really Works!!
review_text: I have always used, what I thought, the best skin products. But after using Relastin for only a few weeks, I was pleasantly surprised to see how amazingly this product has revitalized my skin! At this point I am sold out to Relastin and will only use this product

product_name: Bare Escentuals Beyond the Basics ($110 Value): Beauty
title: the BEST makeup i've ever used
review_text: i've been wearing makeup to some degree or another for over 30 years, and i've never, ever found foundation as good, pure, non-irritating, glow-y or simply as PERFECT as bare minerals.  i truly believe it CLEARED UP my adult acne within a month that i started using it.  i just ordered this kit and i'm confident it will perform as well as the other products i have by this company.  don't waste your $$ on the imitators- everyone's jumped on the mineral makeup bandwagon now, but this original line is hands-down the best

product_name: Bare Escentuals Beyond the Basics ($110 Value): Beauty
title: Great products
review_text: Love the Bare Escentuals line of products. Not one for makeups to begin with, this allows me to even out my skin tone,give vibrance  and is good for the skin. Have never had any skin problems with this line and believe me my skin is sensitive

product_name: StriVectin-SD Intensive Repair, 6-Ounce Tube: Beauty
title: Love This Product
review_text: I've been using StriVectin-SD for almost two years.  There isn't a day that goes by that I don't get a complement on my skin.  I don't wear any make up, aside from lipstick.  My skin alway glows and the fine lines are hardly visible.  I'm in the beauty business and I recommend this product to my customers.  I am NOT a spokesperson for the company, only a happy and satisfied customer

product_name: Britney Spears Curious Britney Spears: Beauty
title: i love it!!
review_text: i've gotten a few compliments on it...by my advice to the ladies who want to buy perfume via online...buy the smaller bottles first to see if you really like the scent...moreso than the big bottles.  i bought the $50 one and i do like it, but i think it's gonna take me awhile to finish it...so from now on, i'll buy the 1.7 oz. first and then buy the bigger bottles if i like the scent.  but overall, very fresh and sweet smelling..

product_name: Britney Spears Curious Britney Spears: Beauty
title: Don't Judge It Because of Britney
review_text:
Obviously some people don't care about reviewing an item, just about bashing a pop artist that doesn't deserve it.

Anyway, I think it smells great.  Obviously it does, or it wouldn't be the bestselling perfume right now.  But don't take my word for it, go to your nearest store and give it a sniff.  Also be sure to check out Fantasy, I think it smells even better

product_name: Calvin Klein Escape For Men: Beauty
title: One for the ladies, ok, maybe! But in a GOOD way
review_text:
I have to agree with the previous reviewer when I say that possibly this IS "one for the ladies". But only in a good way! I first encountered this scent walking past the fragrance counter at the mall many years ago. At the time, it seemed that all the fragrances for men were heavy musks, orientals, spices, etc. This was...er...fruity. (I see you cringing!) It's lemony. Like a puff of lemon cake. A breeze over a lemon field in Tuscany. (are there fields of lemons in Tuscany? I don't know, but it's a mental pic, go with it!) A spritz of cologne following a bit of aftershave balm is a sure recipe to get yourself sniffed and cuddled. It doesn't bash you over the head with macho tones- it lures with tingling tartness. I have yet to meet a woman who dislikes the scent. And yes, I do steal it from my husband sometimes! On him (a light eyed blond) it stays true to the bottle scent, but on me (brunette with oily skin) it morphs to something with vanilla notes in the lemon. I think it's a great "safe" gift for people who aren't sure what cologne to buy for a new male friend.
I gave it four stars, because the cologne does need to be reapplied frequently to maintain a viable scent. The fragrance lasts for approximately four hours. But if you can't get noticed for your lemony deliciousness in four hours, you have more problems than a cologne will fix. (brush your teeth!) LAUGH!! :

product_name: Bobbi Brown Long-Wear Gel Eyeliner: Beauty
title: Perfect eyeliner
review_text: I've tried all types of eyeliner, and they all end up smudging or flaking off, very messy by the end of a long day (or night).  I bought this one to wear at my wedding (in the fantastic chocolate shade) and it was absolutely perfect!  Well worth the price.  Great wear, easy to apply (with a very skinny-tipped brush, I ended up using a tiny paintbrush)and stays exactly where you put it

product_name: HAPPY HEART For Women By CLINIQUE eau de parfum: Beauty: Clinique
title: I love Happy Heart!
review_text: This scent is so clean and not over-powering!  I love this product!  It lasts too!  There's really no need to reapply

product_name: HAPPY HEART For Women By CLINIQUE eau de parfum: Beauty: Clinique
title: Clinique Happy Heart perfume
review_text: I was very pleased with this purchase. The perfume arrived packaged nicely and was actually bigger than I expected 1 oz. to be.  I love the scent and will definately buy more when this one is gone!  Great experience with Amazon

product_name: HAPPY HEART For Women By CLINIQUE eau de parfum: Beauty: Clinique
title: My signature fragrance!!!
review_text: I have always loved happy, but I love my happy heart!  I wear it 99% of the time.  My guy loves the smell too...and I often get comments that it smells wonderful.  Not too strong, just enough.  :)  I'd recommend this perfume to everyone, young and old.

product_name: HAPPY HEART For Women By CLINIQUE eau de parfum: Beauty: Clinique
title: Perfect
review_text: I may be the only woman alive who doesn't like Happy, but I LOVE Heart! It's a perfect fragrance, not too strong but not too light. It's very feminine

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Pink Grapefruit Body Smoother: Beauty
title: Delicious!
review_text: This is probably one to keep away from the kids. It smells good enough to eat and its frothy, whipped consistency makes it even more tempting! It's a bit pricey, but it lathers up really well. I found that about a teaspoon full on my loofah was more than enough for my shower. And it just smells amazing! Very refreshing and a definite mood-lifter. Now I want to try the Whipped Body Delight in this scent

product_name: philosophy powdered sugar cookie flavored lip shine: Beauty
title: Love this!!
review_text: The flavor and scent are great! I continue to smell the "sugar" scent for a while after applying, and it lasts on my lips for a long time. It's a nice, shiny look but doesn't go overboard

product_name: philosophy powdered sugar cookie flavored lip shine: Beauty
title: Yummy!
review_text: This lip gloss smells good, goes on slick and stays on a long time. Great value for the price. I love Philosophy products. They're all great

product_name: Dr.Hauschka Mascara: Beauty
title: Dissappointing! 2 stars, if I could change the scale of stars.
review_text:
I love the idea that this is an all natural mascara + has organic ingredients but nothing artifical or chemicals!!  This is the tipe of mascara which lengthens the lashes not volumises it (I think Dr. Hauschka doesn't make that kind). When it's time to wash it off it comes off very easy (spares your lashes).

Unfortunately I couldn't change my 4 star recommendation to 2...and this is a follow up on my previous review. 
When I'd been using this mascara for about 2 weeks I noticed that it started to flake except for some reason the flakes ended up in my eyes, not on my cheek or under my eyes. First I didn't know it was the mascara..I thought something went into my eyes but every single time I applied, it happened. Not straight away..but in about 2-3 hours later..This was very frustrating...I tried to put less of this product on my lashes but then I looked like I had nothing on. At this point I still had some flaking, not as bad as before, but it was still enough to hurt my eyes..so I just stopped using this product all together.
The only reason why I'd give 2 stars for this product instead of 1 because it's natural and organic...and I appriciate that fact. But that's about it.
I really wanted to like this product so I am very disappointed, it wasn't cheap either. Dr. Hauschka need to improve the quality of this product

product_name: Kinerase Cream 80gm: Beauty
title: Friends said my "face looked younger"
review_text: I read many positive (and very few negative) reviews before I ordered my first tube.  I am 65 living in Florida and  have been using it once daily on face and back of hands for about 4 months.  The cream goes on smoothly, and I have had no negative reaction.  Friends tell me that my face is noticeably younger looking, with less wrinkles.  In fact two friends, based on my favorable experience, are also planning to purchase Kinerase

product_name: Philosophy Falling In Love Shampoo, Bath & Shower Gel: Beauty
title: Luxurious and fragrant bath gel.
review_text: Foams nicely in the tub, rinses away cleanly.  Skin isn't left with any film.  Instead, your skin is left very soft and with a good scent.  Falling in love smells sweet and relaxing, and makes me think of cotton candy.  The large bottle lasts quite a while as a bath gel but goes considerably quicker if you choose to use it as a shower gel.  Recommend you use it with a loofah in the shower

product_name: philosophy on a clear day blemish serum: Beauty
title: A life saver
review_text: I must say that I have been really impressed with this product. I tend to have skin that is combo/oily, which results in occasional pimples here and there. Not really acne, but annoying blackheads and bumps. I had been using something else similar to this with ok results. However, within just 2 days of beginning this, I noticed immediate results. My breakouts have been a non-event, and even if I get a pimple here or there, it's gone in a day. I've even noticed a drastic improvement in those hard-to-eliminate blackheads. My skin feels much smoother and my pores look better. I don't see how I could ever be without this

product_name: philosophy on a clear day blemish serum: Beauty
title: Will get rid of ANY blemish
review_text:
This is the only blemish treatment that I have ever tried that will get rid of anything. Ive been using it for 8 years and it has never let me down. 
You can use it as a spot treatment or if you have an area of clogged pores on your nose you can put a little on every night to help clear those up.
It isnt meant to go on the places of your face where you have no acne or blemishes though. It is strong and can cause a little peeling if you put it on your entire face.
It's a little pricey, but the size of this container will probably last you close to a year

product_name: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: love this powder
review_text: This powder is great. It has great coverage without looking cakey. I also have sensitive skin and this has never bothered me. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's still a little dark for very light skin and it needs to be "touched-up" a little more often than other powders I've tried, but it's worth it

product_name: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: everything clinique is usually good stuff
review_text: i like clinique a lot i needed powder so i got it, in beige..i also like the double pressed powder for even more coverage..fast shippin

product_name: Pure Badger Shave Brush, Chrome Handle: Beauty
title: great value
review_text:
This being my first badger brush, I don't know how competent a reviewer I can be, but i am really happy with it. It is large enough to hold a lot of foam (sometimes i fell like it actually holds too much). It is fairly heavy and robust, which i also like.
I've been using it for about 6 months now, and have a feeling that it is going to last for years.
Make sure to hang it to dry and wash it thoroughly after each use.
For anybody who is new to the wonderful world of shaving with a brush, i highly recommend this page as a intro: [...]

product_name: StriVectin-SD "Better Than Botox?" by Klein Becker Eye Cream 38.45 ml 1.3 oz: Beauty
title: Impressive
review_text: I have been using StriVectin SD eye cream for one month. I am 30 and have no wrinkles but some uneven skin tone, so I cannot comment on wrinkle restoration - my goal is prevention. However, I have a small unsightly broken blood vessel underneath one eye that I have had for 10 years. Applying StriVectin 2x per day has diminished the appearance significantly in just 4 weeks. I am of course hopeful that it will disappear  completely with continued use. I never expected that the broken blood vessel could be treated topically and I was thinking of having a laser treatment (a bit scary though near the eye!). I am thrilled with the cream and will stick with it.

product_name: Laura Mercier Eye Colour Duos: Beauty
title: MORE THAN TWO WAYS ABOUT IT
review_text:
Laura Mercier cosmetics are a bit like bon-bons - you can't have just one.  She makes it easy for us with her Eye Color Duos - 2 compatible eye shadow colors in one mirrored compact.

	While there are five appealing color combinations, all fresh and sheer, my current favorites are Moss and Azure.  With two colors, one light and one dark, I have a veritable palette of possibilities.  Each can be used alone or together with one shading under the brow and the other on the lid.  Or, the colors can be mixed for a completely different effect.

	Colors are intensified by a second or third application.  (A sponge tipped swab is very effective for this.)

	Merci, Mercier!

product_name: Sephora Liner Electro - Glitter Eye Pencil: Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: I want one in every color. It glides on very smooth and the color lasts

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Boo Boo Zap!: Beauty
title: Finally an adult acne treatment that works
review_text: I can't even begin to explain how much I love this product.   Although teen age acne is long gone for me, like most women at that certain time of the month, I get a little flair up here and there.   This product is great.   Totally takes the red out and I say speeds the healing process as well.  I found it it made them disappear over night if I dabbed it on there a few times a day and esp when I saw the begingings of one.   Ones I caught early on never really turned into full blown acne.  Yes it's pricey but I think it's worth every penny.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Boo Boo Zap!: Beauty
title: Really does hide that zit!
reviewer: Sara R. Moufarrige-doepke "Bead girl and Book Maven"
review_text: If you are like me and get the occasional zit when you least expect it, then this works out well. It will not remove the zit, but it will cover the nasty monster pretty well!! I put it under my lancome powder and it really made a difference. Because it is clear it will blend in with whatever foundation or powder you use. oH YES and it covers all the redness that comes with those nasty zits. A girls new best friend :

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Boo Boo Zap!: Beauty
title: Zap it!
review_text: If you're like me, you get the occasional zit at the most inopportune time. BeneFit's Boo Boo Zap! is a bit spendy for such a small amount (about the size of a small tube of lipstick) but it does help. While it won't erase the zit overnight, it will get the red out. You can dab some on under or over makeup too because it goes on clear, not tinted. Definitely worth a try

product_name: Too Faced Lip Injection Intensive Plumping Lip Mask: Beauty
title: Long lasting plumping
review_text: I used this product in the evening and noticed immediate plumping. I also use LipFusion XL (50.00)- but sometimes the results are not long-lasting. When I used the Too-Faced Lip Injection Mask- the results were immediate, and seemed to continue for hours. When I woke in the morning- my lips were very plumped- much more so than with Lip Fusion Alone. I will use these products together- the Lip Injection Mask from Too-Faced is amazing! Used first, then with Lip Fusion XL layered on top after rinsing off the mask- it seriously looked like I had undergone medical-procedure lip-plumping! I highly reccommend this Lip Injection Mask.

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Fabulous item
review_text: Well worth the money, and considered on the the most timeless and staple classics for your makeup bag

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Touche Eclat is EXCELLENT!
review_text: I am 51 and recently visited an upscale retail store in Manhattan.  The Yves St Laurent gal behind the cosmetic counter noticed my complexion was a little sallow - put this product about an inch on each side of my nose and blended it in..what a difference it made...a worthwhile investment..I use it under my eyes and just about all over my face for a nice touch-up, concealer and brightener..covers freckles and sun spots, too

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Touche Eclat
review_text: Awesome product - best concealer I've ever used.  It is lightweight and does not settle into the under eye "creases" that my almost 50-year-old eyes have.  The pink undertone brightens and lightens.

product_name: Chanel Hydrabase Creme Lipstick: Beauty
title: Glad I found it.
review_text: My wife bought this lipstick in Spain, and was happy to find that she could purchase it in the U.S. also.  It's the perfect color for her, and doesn't smudge

product_name: Cucumber Eye Pads (Pack of Ten): Beauty
title: wow what a great price
review_text: this is a great product, however i would like to know if its organic.a very good value too

product_name: PARIS HILTON For Women By PARIS HILTON eau de parfum: Beauty: Paris Hilton
title: This is an absolutey wonerful fragrance
review_text:
I've used Paris Hilton perfume for about a year now.  Ordering it online at Amazon was terrific.  I didn't have to drive, and the price is half the amount you would spend in the department store!!!
If you haven't tried this fragrance, please do so.  You will be wonderfully surprised at how special it makes you feel!
                                                     Donna

product_name: PARIS HILTON For Women By PARIS HILTON eau de parfum: Beauty: Paris Hilton
title: Perfume
review_text: This Paris Hilton perfume is wonderful. I got it 2 months ago in September as one of my birthday presents from my mum. I'd heard of the Paris Hilton perfume a while back but I thought it wouldn't be that good however a few days before my birthday my mum brought home a tester and I was really shocked. The perfume smells delicous, every time I have it on I get tons of compliments. It really is a gorgeous scent perfect for night and day. I have had a lot of perfumes in my life, some of them really expensive but this is by far the best ever. I would recommend this to anyone

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Hair Butter
review_text:
Very Rich,
a little heavy though, can cause buildup. But still, excellent quality

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: healthy hair butter rocks my world
review_text: this is awesome for thick curly hair. apply when wet and it absorbs and keeps you moisturized for days. also good with shea butter to 'slick/smooth' edges for a ponytail

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Finally, a scalp oil without the greasy feel!
review_text: I absolutely love this product! It's been effective on both my natural and now permed hair. It's worth the price. I haven't found anything on the market to match it yet.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Great Conditioning Hairdress
review_text: This product will not work for everyone. It's not really for people with straight, fine hair.  It's formulated to target mostly women of color who have tightly curled, thick, natural hair.  I apply about a nickle-size of this stuff to the ends of my hair before I style it. It leaves my hair soft, manageable, and conditioned - eliminating breakage so that it can grow long and healthy. The aroma is a little too earthy for my personal taste, but I can handle that as long as the natural ingredients work. I give it 5 stars

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Amazing for dry/damaged hair
review_text:
I love this product.  It has healed my brittle hair after being bleached one too many times.  I use it every day and it not only heals and conditions my hair but it holds my style in place.  

As some people mentioned, it can make your hair greasy.  You have to make sure to massage it into your hair and only use a little.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text: I liked this product so much-I'm buying some for my family members who live out of town!  Only a small amount leaves my hair feeling soft, shiny and moisturized.  And it's great on my ends-especially with roller sets! Plus, my darling hubby loves the scent. I use it along with the Khoret Amen Hair Oil

product_name: Carol's Daughter Healthy Hair Butter: Beauty
title: Thick and Natural
review_text: This product is fantastic!  I use it for my daughter who has very thick, beautiful and coarse hair!  It tames her enough so it is not unmanageable and leaves it shiny and soft - this works well with the hair balm!!

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Murad Clarifying Cleanser is a Must Have
review_text: I have tried many face cleaners, Murad Acne Clarifying Cleanser and it is great. Murad Acne Clarifying Cleanser has a nice scent and leaves my face feeling tingly clean without dry it out. Murad Acne Clarifying Cleanser helps control my acne and I would recommend Murad to anyone who needs help with acne.

product_name: Murad Clarifying Cleanser: Beauty
title: Murad is a Miracle
review_text: I know it sounds cliche, but I have literally tried every acne product both over the counter and prescription. Such products include (but are not limited to) Proactiv, Exposed Skin Care, Differin, Accutane, Neutrogena products, Clean and Clear, etc. I have never had results like this. I previously tried the Murad Acne Complex and found it to be a little too harsh for my red, irritated, sensitive skin. I currently switched to the sensitive line for the Murad Acne Complex which consists of this cleanser, Moisturizing Acne Treatment Gel and the Cellular Replenishing Serum. I have found that my cistic acne is gone, the blotchiness is reduced and the number of whiteheads has drastically reduced. My skin has never looked so smooth in all my pre-teen and young adult life and I have only been using this particular line for 4 days! In addition to the sensitive Acne complex, I would also recommend getting the Clarifying Toner. And remember, a little goes a long way with these products!

product_name: The Body Shop Satsuma Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: favorite body shop scent!
review_text: I recently became a fan of Body Shop products and am only sorry that I didn't try them sooner.  Their products are all, without fail, of superior quality.  The Satsuma line especially is wonderful, and is my favorite scent from the Body Shop.  It is the juicy fresh smell of tangerines/oranges.  I have read some reviews that it reminds people of a creamsicle type scent but I completely disagree with that. I have never liked creamsicle scents and I love Satsuma.  It is not cloying or too sweet.  It is a very pure scent and I always feel clean and beautiful while wearing it.  One other thing to note about this product...  I do not always like perfume oils because the scent is not always accurate when compared to other products in the same line.  I am not sure if this is because sometimes the oils are so concentrated that they smell like "too much".  The Satsuma oil is not like that at all - it smells true to the rest of the line.  The scent also lasts for a long time after being applied, due to the fact that it is a perfume oil.  A little goes a long way - I would not be surprised if the bottle lasted for over a year.  I love this product and give it my highest recommendation.

product_name: The Body Shop Satsuma Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: Fresh Energizing and Slightly Exotic
reviewer: Melissa Henstra "lives in her own little world"
review_text: This is currently my absolute favorite scent. I get so discouraged when smell somthing in a store love it, buy it, take it home and put it on, and smells completely different on me. I have never had that problem with this scent. it's smells delicious in the bottle and on the skin, that is if you like citrus. It smells like a fresh, ripe Orange, with the slightest hint of spice. The man in my life finds it quite cuddle worthy. If you are not familiar with perfume oils, just somthing to note. they are highly concentrated, a little goes a long way. it also phases nicely, from intense to pleasently subtle and is long lasting. Another bonus is that there are only few ingredients, so it's less likely to irritate sensitive skin. One bottle will last and last, there is a flexable applicator wand inside the lid. I really can't say enough about this wonderful fragrance

product_name: The Body Shop Indian Gardenia Perfume Oil: Beauty
title: Gardenia Perfume Oil
review_text: This oil smells so good, I just love it. All of my friends say I smell so good

product_name: Kerastase Masque Oleo-Relax Smoothing mask for dry, Rebellious Hair Frizz- 5.1 oz 150 ml: Beauty
title: Great conditioner
review_text: I have very thick hair.  I stopped relaxing it one year ago and felt it was not very easy to manage.  I found the Kerastase Shampoo and combined it with the smoothing mask and my hair became much more easy to manage!  Now I can comb through it as soon as the conditioner is rinsed

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Leave-In Conditioner: Beauty
title: I love it
review_text: My significate other bought the shampoo for me, I use the hair butter and various other products from Carol's Daughter.  I was very fortune to actually make it to the store in New York. I have very short barber-style hair and the scent drives people wild. I will continue to buy these products; if you like the fruity-tuttie smells and your hair grease non petroleum based, Carol's Daughter is for you

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Excellent!
review_text: This is a wonderfully light sunscreen that makes my face feels very smooth.  Definitely worth the money! If you do buy this product, make sure you apply it over your moisturizer, otherwise it will flake when it dries.

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: Very good product but leaves my face with white look
review_text:
This is an excellent product but I have a problem disguising the white look it leaves on my face. At first I thought it was because I used too much, but even when I use only a tiny amount it is still white.

It will certainly suit persons with pale complexions. Wish there was a tint to it

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: HONESTLY THE BEST EVER!
review_text: If you want an SPF that is strong, light, non-greasy, and doesn't smell, THIS IS DEFINITELY IT.  I am addicted and will never use anything else :

product_name: Clarins UV Plus SPF 40: Beauty
title: A Necessity!
review_text: This stuff is wonderful!  I still use a moisturizer w/ SPF 15, but why settle for SPF 15 when you can get SPF 40?  This is not a creamy sunscreen that makes your skin feel all oily and like it can't breathe, instead it's more on the liquid side and you just quickly rub it in, then you can go ahead and put your regular moisturizer and makeup over it.  It's lovely and light and you can wear it every day.  It's the only sunscreen I have found that has enough SPF coverage for my sensitive pale skin but isn't thick enough to clog up my pores and cause breakouts. It may seem expensive, but not only is the quality of the product worth it, but you only need a small amount.  I wear it during the spring and the summer, and after a year I'm still working on the same bottle.  I wasn't sure if it was going to be effective (not being from a brand that you usually associate with rugged outdoor activity), but after a week by the beach, I was the only one who's face wasn't burned all red, even though everyone else had been wearing Coppertone and Bullfrog facial sunscreen

product_name: philosophy falling in love perfumed body lotion: Beauty
title: Love this scent!
review_text: I absolutely love this scent. I originally got the perfume and the 3 in 1 as a gift set and loved it so much I bought the lotion. The scent is a very light sort of cotton candy smell. I have a huge sweet tooth and just love the sweet smells. If you like cotton candy or a sugary smell then you'll love this

product_name: CITY Cosmetics CITY Lips: Beauty
title: I love it!
review_text: I've been using City Lips for the past 6 months and I absolutely love it!  I especially love the moisturizing effect; I used to have to use chapstick constantly, but now I never use it.  My lips now are always soft and moisturized, and fuller!

product_name: CITY Cosmetics CITY Lips: Beauty
title: IT REALLY WORKS
review_text: Citylips has made my lips larger! i love the clear i use it all day long. i will buy this product again

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance: Beauty
title: A soft, sweet fragrance
review_text: When I first tried this perfume, it reminded very much of Victoria's Secret Pink--it had that same distinctly sweet, strongly scented unique floral note, yet here the bouquet was significantly softer, sweeter.  It would work well for someone who likes a sweet, girly scent that is light yet still pronounced.  The one drawback is that the staying power is poor:  I couldn't detect any trait of this just a few hours later.  This is a bit disappointing give the high price, yet this still might be a good choice for someone who is looking for an everyday fragrance and doesn't mind having to reapply

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance: Beauty
title: WONDERFUL
review_text: I absolutely fell in love with this fragrance.  It smells like a day at the County Fair, absolutely lovely.  You have to layer it though to make it last.. wash with the shower gel, put on the body lotion first thing when you get out of the shower or bath, (perfumes "stick" better that way, while you're "moist"), and then spray.  If you wash your hair, spray while your blow-drying it out.  Carry the spray in your purse, you will need to "touch up" during the day

product_name: philosophy falling in love fragrance: Beauty
title: Everyone is falling in love with me!
review_text: I was afraid of this fragrance in the bottle, since it smelled like carmelized sugar to me. I tried the shower gel first, loved it, had to try the perfume.  Everyone loves it! My friend even asked if she could copy me and wear it too! Of course I said yes, everyone needs a little love!  We both agree to spritz a little extra on if you want others to smell it, it goes on very light. An extra spritz is not obnoxious with this scent

product_name: Kenzo FlowerbyKenzo: Beauty
title: Elegant, Sensual & Intoxicating
review_text:
This scent is truly intoxicating.  I have tried various perfumes like Arpege, Evelyn Rose and J'adore but there was always something missing.  Flower by Kenzo is by far the most satisfying fragrance.  It has the Elegance of Arpege,
Sensuality of Evelyn Rose and Classiness of J'adore.  This product-line also have matching Deoderant so not to clash with the perfume. How nice is that! It is not too strong either but lasts for a long time. I have at last found my favorite scent that makes me feel really good

product_name: Kenzo FlowerbyKenzo: Beauty
title: best perfume ever
review_text: i have to admit, i'm a very picky perfume shopper...but flower by kenzo is amazing.  is light, flowery, elegant & casual...truly wonderful

product_name: Kenzo FlowerbyKenzo: Beauty
title: I LOVE KENZO FLOWER!!!!!!!!!
review_text:
This is my favorite perfume i have ever had before! 
My mom wants this for Christmas and shes been using my whole bottle! You may think that im a kid and i will say that but i am a HUGE KENZO FAN! I love her dearly and i say that this is the best perfume she ever made before. U gotta give the girl credit! I love this perfume. This is not a waste of money and the reviews are right they don't stay that long but i dont care because u may not smell it strong but that is because this fragrance is eligant and beautiful! I LOVE IT. I bet you would to! It is sooooooooo not a waste of money!

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Eye Shadow Soft Shimmer: Beauty
title: best shadow out there
review_text: I have only used clinique eye shadows and have been so happy with them. I've tried different brands and always come back to this one. They have great colors and it lasts all day without creasing or looking too "powdery".

product_name: Relastin, Eye Silk, 0.5 oz, 15 ml: Beauty
title: Feels Great
review_text: This product really does feel like silk....Out of all the eye products, I really like this one.  I would recommend it!

product_name: Dior Pure Poison: Beauty
title: Oh yea! Heaven, I'm in Heaven!!
review_text: Love this scent. Definately not too strong and it seems to last quite a while. Perfect for everyday wear. It has a strong undertone of vanilla so if that's not your bag I wouldn't recommend it

product_name: Dior Pure Poison: Beauty
title: im really sorry
review_text: im really sorry about my review below. my friend did it without me knowing off my accout. im really sorry

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: different - but great
review_text: i wish it smelled more of cinnamon and less of clove. but that's just me. i'm not a huge clove fan. BUT it worked great, made my hair & scalp feel awesome. will definitely buy this again. and i can't wait to try other LUSH products

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great shampoo that could be just a little better
review_text:
My hair tends to fall out due to me not eating enough protein, so NEW! (Hair) is a lifesaver.  As others have said, it lathers like you wouldn't believe -- you really only need to roll it in your hands two or three times to get enough for a thick lather -- and it has an amazing scent.  (Sniffing the bar can actually be a bit addictive...you can smell it really strongly even before you open the box!)  I've found that keeping it in a small lightly covered dish in my bedroom, away from the moisture of the bathroom, is the best way to preserve it for a while.  (Also, it works as an accidental room freshener -- seriously, the smell is incredible!)

My only wish is that the scent would last a little longer in my hair, since it doesn't really stick, even right after showering, unless I use a lot of lather, and that ends up being expensive since then the bar doesn't last as long.  Most of the time, there isn't even much of a hint, whereas other Lush shampoos can make your hair smell wonderful, even a bit overpowering, for days.

Also, unlike some of the other Lush products, it leaves my hair fairly flat.  It's true that it helps with making hair really soft and shiny, but it seems to have the opposite effect when it comes to volume, and that's not so good when you're already having some hair loss.  Using a mostly scent-free conditioner after is almsot necessary, at least in my experience.

I think NEW! (Hair) is a terrific shampoo for its hair-restoring qualities and general sniffability, but at the same time, it could be a little better with its more cosmetic qualities.  Buy it more for the former than the latter if you want the most enjoyment and value out of it.  And if you do have hair loss, trust me -- the price is worth it

product_name: NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Make my hair soft and shiny
review_text: I love this shampoo. It make my hair so soft and shiny. I cut the shampoo in four, and use it every other day. Then I keep it at dry place. This shampoo last long too. The smell is great too. Love it! I'm going to buy it for my mom

product_name: Bare Escentuals Baby Buki Brush: Beauty
title: Baby Buki is best
review_text: I just bought this the other day having owned the regular sized Kabuki brush.  I find I like the Baby Buki better, it still gives great coverage just in a more compact size which I love

product_name: philosophy pure grace perfumed shower cream: Beauty
title: I'll Never Wash With Anything Else Again
review_text:
My title says it all. This smells so amazing, and is such a lush and fabulous lather, that I will never wash with any other soap again. I even bought the perfume because I found myself sniffing my arms all day long after a shower. 

It's fantastic, it's totally worth the money, and it lasts a long time. One bottle lasts me 2-3 months, bathing every day. I've even used this in my hair before... but it tends to dry out my hair a lot and I need a lot of moisture because I have blonded curly hair.

product_name: Kerastase Nutritive Bain Satin 2 Shampoo- 8 oz.: Beauty
title: Extraordinarily effective
review_text: The Kerastase line is hard to find (used to be only sold in Kerastase salons, I believe.) The shampoos do EXACTLY what they say. In this case, this is a moisturizing shampoo for dried hair that may be overly chemically treated. I only wish they came in larger bottles

product_name: Clinique Almost Lipstick: Beauty
title: A cult classic - for good reason
review_text: Since I was in high school, so many women have praised the wonders of Almost Lipstick in Black Honey.  I finally self-gifted and purchased for myself, and all of my expectations have been met.  The color is initially scary in the tube, but at the very least swipe it on your hand - you'll see that it is actually a very wearable sheer brownish raspberry color.  You can layer it for a stronger color, or swipe it over lip balm to make it even more sheer.  The resulting effect is your lips, but better.  The color of your lips is improved and they are moist and shiny looking.  If you layer repeatedly over dry lips it is a very shiny deep red brown color.  I've seen Black Honey worn by fair/medium Asian and White women and has looked flattering on every one of them.  Lastly, the product does not smell.  It has no perfumes that become disgusting as the day wears on, nor does it have that cheap waxy smell/taste.  A fabulous product

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: Best Hair Treatment Ever
review_text:
I have: long, thick, fine hair that is naturally wavy.  I don't color my hair but I do get frizzies and split ends, and some dryness.  I tried this product out after receiving a small sample with a [...] order, and fell in love with it.  I -love- the smell, and was surprised that other people didn't seem to.  I vastly prefer it to some of the faker, more chemical smells that a lot of shampoos seem to use.

I didn't use it as a leave in, but did the deep conditioning treatment, and afterwards I kept flipping my hair forward over my shoulder, both to smell it and to just feel how amazingly soft it was.  This product left my hair looking healthy, shiny, and gorgeous for days.  I get a fair number of compliments on my hair in general, but after I used this stuff I was getting stopped on the street.  Everyone from the lady at Starbucks to my professor mentioned how beautiful my hair looked.  I highly recommend it.

I have tried a lot of hair products, including some (like Fekkai's glossing cream) made with olive oil, and had better results with Ojon (though I do like a lot of Fekkai products).  Other products I recommend are: Healthy Sexy Hair shampoo, conditioner, and leave-in conditioner, Jonathan Product Anti-Frizz Serum, Origins Happy Ending conditioner, and Fekkai products for curly and straight hair, depending on your mood :)  Products I don't recommend include Suave and Fekkai's Glossing Shampoo (left my hair shiny all right, but frizzy.)

I would suggest ordering it from Sephora, as they carry several sizes, give samples with all online orders, and are very, very good at taking returns, even if you've tried the product out and just don't like it

product_name: Ojon Restorative Hair Treatment: Beauty
title: Wonderful!
review_text: I have straight hair, and this products makes my hair insanely smooth and beautiful...the smell is strong, but I like it, though everyone won't.  Use very little of the restorative treatment, or your hair will be very oily

product_name: Lancome Renergie Microlift Active Redefining Treatment SPF 15 50ml/1.7oz: Beauty
title: Love it!
review_text: I use Renergie Microlift Active Redefining Treatment as a preconditioner prior to the placement of foundation on my face. I cannot imagine using anything else. I find it challenging to find a product that allows my foundation to go on silky smooth yet without feeling greasy or causing blemishes. I am in my fourties and this is the best product I have found

product_name: philosophy pure grace hot salt exfoliating scrub: Beauty
title: Yummy!
review_text: Great salt scrub and it really does get warm on contact and leaves skin baby sooofft

product_name: Bliss Serious Seaweed Cellulite Soap: Beauty
title: Exfoliation Extrodinaire!
review_text: I have extremely dry skin that builds up and needs exfoliation frequently, and I've tried every body wash, gritty scrub, brush and soap known, from Clarins down to Caress, and this bar works like magic for me!  I didn't notice fantastic decrease in cellulite, and the little bumps do wear off. But using the soap practically "molts" me, leaving dead skin behind in the bathtub (yikes!), and I'm ready for application of other products right into my new skin (Fat Girl Slim...Clarins Total Body Firming Cream...I prefer Dior Plasticity).  And goodbye ingrown hairs- the stuff is great for prevention.  Did I metion a great exfoliator prior to self-tanning?  This stuff is a GREAT BUY!  The long-lasting soapy smell that interferes with my perfume is the only reason I gave it 4 stars

product_name: The Body Shop Strawberry Body Butter: Beauty
title: Great product
review_text: Everything was great about this from the product to the promptness which it was received.

product_name: Tweezerman Browmousse: Beauty
title: Works as described...will last a long time
review_text: This product is the best of this type I've ever used.  I would recommend it

product_name: Tweezerman Browmousse: Beauty
title: Highly Recommended!
review_text:
