product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: Vanilla scent not so bad!
reviewer: Lindsey Justice "MAC addict, and reader of many things"
review_text: I'm REALLY anal about scented/flavored lipglosses- especially ones scented or flavored with vanilla, but MAC LipGlass isn't that vanilla-ish at all!  It's got very pigmented color, it stays on a LONG time for a gloss, and each tube lasts a long time...  Don't let what the other reviewer said about the vanilla scent throw you off

product_name: philosophy lavender pound cake shampoo, body wash, and bubble bath: Beauty
title: Smells good to me!
review_text: I thought this stuff smelled fantastic, and very similar to a lavender poundcake. I guess smell is very subjective, though, so if you're not sure about this one, you might want to have a sniff at your local Sephora or department store before purchasing

product_name: Karma Natural Dusting Powders by LUSH: Beauty
title: Very nice.
review_text:
I received this as a gift, and love it.  I don't normally use dusting powders, but this is light and silky.  The scent is very patchouli, which I happen to like.  Sort of reminds me of the head shops from the 60's-70's.  

I especially like the fact that all LUSH products are natural without a lot of chemicals

product_name: L'Occitane Almond Shower Oil 8.4oz: Beauty
title: L'Occitane Almond Products
review_text: This product is amazing! I have very dry skin and this just soaks in,leaving my skin soft and rejuvenated for days.I even have used it for my  shampoo @ times with good results there,too.

product_name: L'Occitane Almond Shower Oil 8.4oz: Beauty
title: Good...very good.
review_text: A time saver.  Slap in on while still wet right after your shower; instant moisturization if you've got to jump in, jump out, and go.  And it smells delicious

product_name: Sephora Complexion Extractor with Lance: Beauty
title: Pretty handy tool...
review_text: This tool is great for removing whiteheads and blackheads both.  As a RN with dermatology experience I have used many tools, I like this one as it saves you from bruising, or squishing your skin. So it solves the problem with a minimum of damage.  If you haven't used anything like this it may take some getting used to, but it's way better than using your fingers.  I gave it 4 of 5 stars as it can be a bit difficult to line up because the hole is so small

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Delicious and classic!
review_text: I love this scent - it's so fresh yet so distinctive.  Light enough to wear to a ballet or other event where you're in close qurters with others, but distinct enough that people notice it.  Every time I wear it I get compliments on how great I smell.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Beautiful
review_text: I really smell the peach in this, and thats why I love it. I love how its mixed in with the powdery florals. Its not heavy, its sexy without trying too hard and there is something old fashioned about it but it has a modern twist. I love this perfume

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Sensual Maybe Baby
review_text: Soft, sensual -  made me feel feminine and attractive - My husand agrees

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: A Feminine Scent for Everyday
review_text: I am so sick of all the fragrances out there that smell like chocolate, pie or cake. Why people want to smell like food puzzles me. That's why I was so glad to find a feminine floral scent with a little tease to it. Maybe Baby is delightful, not too heavy but making its presence known. The complements will flow. It's sweet (not too sweet though) and innocent while at the same time being flirty. If I had to pick a season it reminds me of it would be Spring. I can't describe a frangrance anymore than I can describe a wine but with all the stinkers out there I just had to put in a good word for this very wearable scent.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Maybe Baby: Beauty
title: Classic femininity!
review_text: If you love the scent of the Bathina line, Benefit has finally come out with an eau de toilette with the same scent. I wear this scent everyday and I always get compliments. I love to put the scent in my hair because it lingers in hair longer than skin. Many scents smell different on different skin types, but Maybe Baby is a pretty true scent. I guaruntee you will absolutely love this perfume and so will everyone around you. :

product_name: The Body Shop Hemp Lip Protector Tin: Beauty
title: BEST CHAP STICK
review_text: Ok I have really large lips and for years I have tried everything to protect them. Get this tin, for some reason the stick doesn't work as well, and your lips will be unchapped for the whole day. It's pricey but worth every penny if your like me and your lips chap easily. Trust me I have tried everything, even pricier chapsticks and this one does the trick

product_name: L'Occitane - Lavender - Eau de la Recolte Bleue: Beauty
title: Lovely, fresh, light and relaxing!
review_text:
L'Occitane combined their famous lavender note with touches of peach, marigold and freesia to create a lovely, fresh and relaxing scent.  It's a nice one to wear before bed, too, not overpowering.  In the summer, I look for fragrances that contain natural notes mosquitoes do not care for and lavender is one of them.  The peach note in some fragrances also turns funky on my skin, but I have not had this problem with Eau de Recolte Bleue.  I prefer this over their Lavender Harvest fragrance, which I think would smell better on men (JMOP.)

Here is a description from their website:

"Eau de la RÃ©colte Bleue exudes all the pleasures of Provence. Both fresh and as light as air, it captures the celebratory feel of the Lavender Harvest.

Composed from a blend of the green scent of leaves and A.O.C. Lavender essential oil, Eau de la RÃ©colte Bleue is accompanied by the delicate notes of freesia, marigold and frosted peach. Woody and musky aromas then leave a lingering and sensual, fragrant trail."

All in all, I find this soft, gentle and thoroughly wearable.  Especially enjoy it on a summer evening.

product_name: Murad Age Spot & Pigment Lightening Gel: Beauty
title: Great results, good value for your $
review_text: I have been using this cream for almost 2 months now and the results are amazing. My sun spots are lightened and it has also decreased the redness on my face. I will continue to use it and highly recommend it.

product_name: Murad Age Spot & Pigment Lightening Gel: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text: Growing up worshiping the sun had finally taken its toll on my skin. As of late I have noticed sun spots on my face, chest and hands (yuck!). My Esthetician recommended I try Murad's Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Gel. In about a month I noticed the spots beginning to fade! It is super light weight and soaks in fast too!  Now all I have to do is remember the sunscreen..

product_name: Laura Mercier Foaming One-Step Cleanser, 5 fl. oz.: Beauty
title: SIMPLIFY, SIMPLIFY, SIMPLIFY !
review_text:
Simplify, simplify, simplify! That's what I try to do with my beauty routine. Hence, I was first attracted to LAURA MERCIER'S facial cleanser by its name "ONE-STEP CLEANSER." 

I'm staying with it because it works. No more separate purchases for eyemake removers or "deep cleansers. 

"ONE-STEP CLEANSER" removes all traces of makeup even from the delicate eye area and leaves my skin feeling clean, supple and nourished. It's both easy and effective

product_name: Yves Saint Laurent Touche Eclat (Radiant Touch Highlighter): Beauty
title: Cover Up Dark Circles
review_text: Put the "light" back in highlight without that greasy feeling.  Your dark circles will be concealed, and you'll look wide awake

product_name: Klein-Becker StriVectin-SD® Eye Cream: Beauty
title: works well
review_text: I like this product, but am not sure it is worth the money. I have bought other products for $5 at my local store and I seem to have similar results

product_name: Pre de Provence 250g Honey Almond Shea Butter Enriched Triple Milled Soap: Beauty
title: Great
review_text: I decided to try it out and have found the only soap I want to use.  The fragrance is great, it does not overpower.  I guess the milling process gives the soap it's texture which removes the need for all those bath/shower accessories.  And 1 bar lasted over 2 months.  I will definitely be ordering more and trying other products this vendor carries

product_name: Pre de Provence 250g Honey Almond Shea Butter Enriched Triple Milled Soap: Beauty
title: Gentle, fragrant and long lasting
review_text: The ground almond hulls are gentle enough for daily use of the soap directly on the skin without being scratchy. The scent is strong, but not overpowering and both the soap and scent are long lasting. This soap is also so moisturizing that my  skin doesn't require lotion as it does after most store brand soaps and shower gels. This particular soap is my main shower bar and my great experience with it convinced me to return to bar soap after years of being a Bath and Body Works shower gel and lotion fiend.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: LOVELY, DELICIOUS, PERFECT
review_text: "Body so fine" is the most beautiful and luxurious cosmetic I ever had. I recommend it because the description of benefit is absolutely real. It's the most delicious, velvet and beautiful balm for the legs and the arms. Also the retro - chic and vintage box and can are romantic and beautiful. PERFECT for me

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: So cute and feminine
review_text: I got some of this body balm yesterday. The lady at the Benefit counter said that it would make my skin look luminescent like a Victoria's Secret model. She put a sample on one of my arms and I held it up to the other arm. The difference was amazing! The arm with the Bathina looked smoother, silker, and had a pearlized look. I can't stop raving about this stuff. It is slightly expensive, but the tin is really big (and adorable) and the supply of the balm is huge. It should last a really long time. This balm is one of the best products that Benefit has

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: Hmmmm....
review_text:
Benefit claims that this is all you will want to wear, and I am starting to think this might be true...

First, I have to say that the texture is intriguing.  It's a balm, but it feels much more velvety, and the slight shimmer gives you a sheen.

Second, I am a sucker for the packaging and presentation.  It comes in a little tin box, with the signature Bathina (very retro chic) and a black powder puff that has a pink ribbon holder.  It makes you want to apply the product in public, just to have an excuse to show off the set.  Also, it ups the feminity factor of applying a product with the little puff (very "I adore being a girl...")

Then, there's the scent.  It's a floral, sexy fragrance that doesn't overpower.  It's clean and a big plus is that it doesn't make me sneeze, like some other scents.

I think that a little goes a long way, and thus, I can say that even though it's a "boutique-brand" product, it is very affordable.  I think that as warmer weather sets in, and you want to show off a little more skin, this is a product that would enhance a tan.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Bathina Body So Fine: Beauty
title: Replacement for Stockings
review_text: I couldn't resist the very feminine and retro look of the packaging. And it does look cute in the bathroom. That being said this is great to add a layer of sheen to the legs. Your calves look great without stockings. I find it too waxy to use on the rest of the body but there's nothing better on bare legs. To add a glow to the skin, especially to a tan, try Benefit's Flamingo Fancy

product_name: philosophy strawberry milkshake body souffle: Beauty
title: Yums...
review_text: I've seen lots of negative feedback on the strawberry milkshake scent, but I have to say I love it.  This lotion takes me back to my child hood.  It's got a strawberry quick/bubblegum smell to it.  I think it's fun for summer days

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Bare Brilliance Lipstick: Beauty
title: Wonderful!!!!!!
review_text:
Clinique's Bare Brilliance is one of my absolute favorite lipsticks ever!
It has a fairly sheer finish with lovely little sparkles in it.  I have Berrylicious(sheer grape) and Cherry Quartz(sheer, true red--doesn't look like it does on the color swatch) and neither overwhelms my pale skin.  I wouldn't be caught dead without a Bare Brilliance lipstick in my makeup bag or purse!

product_name: Youngblood Loose Mineral Blush: Beauty
title: Beautiful!
review_text: I use the Dusty Pink, and I have never ever used a blush that looks so natural, and makes my skin glow so healthy.  With or without the mineral foundation from Youngblood; just lovely.  Highly recommended

product_name: Hard Candy Lip Gloss Ring: Beauty
title: Cute gloss in a cute ring ...
review_text: I loveee this ring soo much .. it looks cute on my mdidle and index finger and the gloss is moisturizing with a touch of glitter .. all in one word: glam!!

product_name: Hard Candy Lip Gloss Ring: Beauty
title: A SPARKLER FOR A STOCKING STUFFER
review_text:
Here's a gem of an idea for a small gift or stocking stuffer for the preteen girls on your list - a cute lip gloss ring from Hard Candy.

     The ring is heart shaped with a flip top filled with a lightly tinted sparkly lip gloss.  It comes in three shades and glosses - Heartbreaker, which is a peach; Kiss Me, which is hot pink, and Yummy, which is baby blue.  All are fruit scented.

      Boxed in a ring box with a faceted lid (presentation, you know), it's finger fun

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Takes practice....
review_text: Mastering the stencils does require some practice...but the color is good for blondes.  I also follow up the powder with an eyebrow pencil to make my eyebrows look a little more defined.  I think my eyebrows look better since using this product

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Brow Ex-press Easy to use
review_text: I loved this product.  The Stencils are easy to use and the instructions are easy to follow.  The Browns are a bit dark so if you have red in your hair like I do you might want to start out light you can always go darker if you need to

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Harder than i thought
review_text: After watching Anastasia do eye brows on TV i decided that i needed to get this item and try to do better shaping of my eye brows.  After receiving this kit, i found that is is quite hard to do by yourself.  Holding the stencil in the proper alinement is difficult for one person to do on themselves.  I do however shape my daughters brows.  In conclusion i think that it takes a lot of skill and i think it would be better to go to her personally or some other experienced person.

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: Fantastic - very happy :-O
review_text:
One time while in Los Angeles, I had the forward thinking enough to book an appointment with Anastasia because I'd seen her on Oprah and in magazines and knew she was Queen of the eyebrows.  I thought if I had one appointment, I could maintain them afterward myself.  If you live nowhere near Bev Hills or aren't going to be in LA, this is the next best thing.  It's like having her in your home permanently.
The kit is fantastic.  There are different colours to choose from and it's easy to use.  It does look a little weird at first if you use the colour where there are no brows, but I don't know if everyone can tell, or we girls are just a little more fussy when it comes to ourselves.
This is the best way to get the perfect shape and it really DOES make a difference to your face.  You'll look better and ultimately feel better.  The stencil is the best invention and I highly recommend it

product_name: Anastasia Brow Ex-press: Beauty
title: should have  bought straight from sephora
review_text: I LOVE THE PRODUCT, AS AN AFTERTHOUGHT THIS WAS SENT FROM SEPHORA WHERE WITH EVERY PURCHASE YOU RECEIVE A BONUS SAMPLE AND EVEN FREE SHIPPING IF YOU QUALIFY. WISH I'D WENT TO THEIR SITE, SINCE I'M A FREQUENT SHOPPER THERE ALSO, OH WELL AMAZON IS WHERE I WILL BUY BOOKS, DVDS   ETC..

product_name: Clinique Stay-Matte Sheer Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: love this powder
review_text: This powder is great. It has great coverage without looking cakey. I also have sensitive skin and this has never bothered me. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it's still a little dark for very light skin and it needs to be "touched-up" a little more often than other powders I've tried, but it's worth it

product_name: La Mer Creme de La Mer: Beauty
title: Excellent for problem skin
review_text:
If you have smooth skin, this product is not for you. 

My skin had no human quality about it; after I went through many procedures of bleaching and laser treatments. I suffer from extreme skin dryness, uneven and dull skin. Other lotions made my face look greasy, or failed to give it that moisturised look.

I have tried many products, for my extreme dry dull skin issues, and this is the first product that has worked for me. Now my skin looks hydrated and normal. It is quite a feat

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Bain Volumactive Shampoo Volumizing - 8.5 oz.: Beauty
title: Kerastase Volumactive Shampoo
review_text: Wonderful shampoo.  I have color treated hair and my color stays shiny and my hair is thicker after I shampoo.  I use the shampoo daily and no longer have scalp problems from product buildup

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Great product!
review_text: This is a great moisturizer for my hair and scalp.  Very light and smells great

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Mimosa Hair Honey
review_text: I was recommended this product for my son's hair and have had many recommendations over the years, since he has beautiful thick curly hair that can tend to be dry and frizzy.  I used a little of this product in his wet hair and it leaves it shiny with less frizz and more curls.  He is 10 and not crazy about the smell, but I think it smells nice.  Fantastic product

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Kansas City User
review_text:
I purchased this product based on the reviews, and I can't begin to tell you how glad I am to have the Hair Honey.  It is wonderful!!  It leaves my hair looking absolutely healthy and bouncy.  The smell was overwhelming at first but the benefits of what the product does for your hair are far greater.

I will be using this for a long time to come

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Wonderful
review_text: I just started using Carols Daughters products but I really like the Hair Honey as an everyday moisturizer for my ends and to smooth my natural hair in the front. I just use a little water and hair honey, tie a scarf for about ten minutes, and my all-natural new growth is smooth, soft, and exactly where I want it to be without using harsh gels, sprays, or spritzes. I am using this and the CD Healthy Hair Butter as a leave-in. I love the fact that its all natural ingredients that are really great and yummy for the hair.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Mimosa Hair Honey: Beauty
title: Honey is Worth The Money
review_text: Forgive me for the rhyme, but the sentiment is true.  This product is rich, but at the same time light.  After opening the jar, I loved the way the Hair Honey smelled, it has a sweet aroma but I didn't detect the "cirtus" smell in the product description.  I am only sorry I didn't get the larger size.

product_name: philosophy buttercream frosting ultra-rich 3-in-1 shampoo, shower gel and bubble bath 16 oz: Beauty
title: smells awesome!
review_text: really enjoy using this as body wash.  the smell is divine, but the bubbles don't last long if used as a bubble bath or shampoo.  moisturizing to my dry skin

product_name: philosophy buttercream frosting ultra-rich 3-in-1 shampoo, shower gel and bubble bath 16 oz: Beauty
title: Subtle scent, rich and creamy foam
review_text: I originally bought this item because I was hoping for the same scent that Yankee candle produces in their candle line.  The smell is nice, although it doesn't reach out and grab you like true buttercream.  Still, it's nice to shower with and you won't be disappointed with the lather.  I put a quarter sized amount on my shower puff and still had to ring out foam from it after I was finished.  Also, the lather is creamy and it just feels like it is moisturizing your skin.  All in all, I am happy with my purchase.  I only gave 4 stars because I like a stronger scent, but if you like more subtlety I'm sure you'll enjoy it

product_name: Clinique Acne Solutions Concealing Stick Shade 01: Beauty
title: the best acne cover stick I have tried
review_text: This concealer comes in a pencil form, so it is very precise and offers very good coverage.  It stays on well.  It is more waxy and not as soft and creamy as most concealers, so you can put it in a small, precise spot and it will actually stay there.  I have tried many concealers for small blemishes, and this is my favorite.  It comes in enough shades so you can find a good match, which is important

product_name: Lancome Bi-Facil Non-Oily Instant Cleanser Sensitive Eyes 125ml/4.2oz: Beauty
title: Lancome Bi-Facil Non-Oily Instant Cleanser Sensitive Eyes
review_text: wear make up every day, and I usually wear foundation, eyeliner, mascara, eyeshadow and lip gloss. That's my every day make up. By the end of the day I have to get it off in order to sleep well. Lancome make up remover helps me a lot. Its very easy to use,it takes off make up quickly and without scrubbing. It's gentle and not irritating. It also smells nice. Though it's kind of expensive, it's a good product.

product_name: Rene Furterer Complexe 5 (1.7 oz. Bottle): Beauty
title: Activate Micro-Circulation
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The emotionally healing benefits of orange oil and lavender become immediately apparent when you apply this to your scalp. If you can find someone to give you a head massage with this product, then you can truly relax. If applying this yourself, it works well as an at home hair treatment to nourish the hair follicles and promote healthy hair growth. You will also notice your hair becoming stronger and retaining a much deeper shine. The essential oils in this product help to activate micro-circulation which may cause a slight tingling and warming of the scalp. Leave this in for about 5-10 minutes and then wash your hair as normal. You may find you need less conditioner when using this product. Many hairdressers will use this product when giving a conditioning head massage and that is where I first found out about this product. I bought my first bottle the day I had the massage. I was that impressed and I keep buying this product. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Rene Furterer Complexe 5 (1.7 oz. Bottle): Beauty
title: Great for oily scalps!!
review_text: I use this everyother day before shampooing. My hair is much less greasy after using it!! I've also noticed that my hair seems to have more body at the roots. It also has a very pleasant orange/citrus scent. This product is worth every cent. I definitely recommend it for those with oily scalps and thinning hair

product_name: Bourjois Le Petite Black Dress Eye-sentials ($50 Value): Beauty
title: 5 STARS+_+_+_+_+
review_text: this is a MUST MUST MUST i love this kit all of the items included are awesome a must have you will probly not be disappointed gives the best smokey eye loo

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Fun and zesty way to wash my hair
review_text:
For those bored with the same old bottles of shampoo an hair products at their local drugstore this is a fun new way of washing their hair with no chemicals and natural botanicals that truly do wonders and enhance every single hair.

This solid shampoo bar works wonderfully; I had my doubts just like everyone else, and was worried that this would remove the build up but leave the hair overly squeaky clean and stripped, and if it would later at all. To my surprise this small disc turns into an avalanche of bubbles once I wet it and rub it between the hands. I also wet my hair and rub the bar all over, working with the lather form my hands and the lather from the wet bar. I have to admit that this produces more lather than liquid shampoos and washes the hair without leaving it feeling like it was tortured, instead its slippery and wonderfully light. Afterwards I follow with the American Cream conditioner (probably the best hair scented product in the universe) also from Lush for a head of hair that feels rich and buttery soft, with a fresh light fragrance that lingers on.

The scent itself is wonderful, citrusy and earthy, with Patchouli Oil, Orange Oil, Lavendin Oil, Pine Oil , Lemongrass Oil , Elemi Oil , Gardenia Extract and the Roman Chamomile Flower. I often find that all the oils and rich botanicals nourish the hair and leave it feeling happy, organic and natural products have been of high interest to me lately because of the results they deliver for bouncy hair and supple skin. After using drugstore and even expansive brands of hair products and skin potions, I find that my skin and hair never really benefited from all those preservatives and unnatural products derived from mineral oils and god knows what else. Lush and Burt's Bees, Jason and The Body Shop made me change my mind and seek out products that are as good as they smell, and that truly transform me from a sleepy duckling in the morning to a happy princess by the time my morning routine is over.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Karma Komba Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: OMG
review_text: I JUST got out of the shower a minute ago, and I must say this is the best shampoo I've ever bought. My scalp hasn't felt this clean and fresh in a long time. Washing my super-thick and waist length hair didn't feel like a chore for once, and I actually look forward to my next washing. The smell reminds me of the hippie shops on Haight Street in San Francisco. I love it

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: A MIRROR SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy!

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Great Product
review_text: For the price this product is great - the bubbles were thick and rich and lasted a long time.  The scent was light and fragrant, not over-powering like some other products.  For those who love their bubble baths - highly recommended

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Good bubbles, fading scent
review_text: I've been pleased with both the quantity and quality of the bubbles, but the scent fades rather quickly.  If the scent lasted longer, it would be much improved

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Honey, make a bee line for your tub with this one
review_text: I received this a a gift for Valentine's Day this year.  It's a nice bubble bath with lots of foam (rather than big, double bubbles).  It's chock full of natural ingredients and no SLS so it's very gentle- even for little ones.  I do however prefer the Deep Steep in the calming lavender chamomile or energizing rosemary mint.

product_name: Deep Steep - Bubble Bath: Beauty
title: Yummy relaxing scents
review_text: I love the scent of the Grapefruit-Bergamot bubble bath.  This combination is suitable for men or women.  Deep Steep products are really first rate.  The foot scrub and lotions are well worth the money

product_name: Britney Spears Surprising Twist!: Beauty
title: fantasy
review_text: i bought this but the perfume side was a clear color not purple colored and there is no color in the lip gloss it's ust glittery but i love i

product_name: Iman Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: The best for women of color and ethnicities
review_text: I used to sell Iman when it was in a major department store.  This stuff would fly off the shelves.  Too bad it was hardly ever in stock which made many customers go to something else.  I stuck with it for 10 years now and would not dare use anything else!  Buy it - you will not be disappointed

product_name: Iman Pressed Powder: Beauty
title: Very Nice!
review_text: I have been using i-man line of products for the past 5 years, and have been a very happy customer. This is my first time shopping for i-man makeup online and I realize that Amazon.com has it for half price. This is a fantastic deal and the product is beautiful for all skin tone. My friends comment that I look flawless.

product_name: Vera Wang Truly Pink: Beauty
title: Truly Pink . . .
review_text:
Knowing how I love everything pink, a dear friend of mine gave this to me as a present. I love the scent, it's not overpowering but has that lovely and alluring smell. It's so fragrant and I feel like I'm forever in a garden full of freshly-bloom beautiful pink roses. 

One of the simple pleasures in life - Truly Pink by Vera Wang. 

Leave a scent of you behind. 

Wholeheartedly recommended.

product_name: H2O Plus Face Oasis® Hydrating Treatment: Beauty
title: Great stuff
review_text: For a guy who never paid attention to the face cream he used, I found H2O Plus to be amazing stuff.  Non-greasy, no heavy scents -- it's worth every penny

product_name: H2O Plus Face Oasis® Hydrating Treatment: Beauty
title: Amazing product!
review_text: Face Oasis isn't like any other moisturizer I've tried - One application makes my skin appear plump and well-hydrated even if I've neglected to drink my 8 glasses of water that day.  It isn't at all greasy, absorbs quickly, and serves as a great base over which to apply my makeup. The guys I've introduced it to have raved about it as well!

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Wave Creating Spray: Beauty
title: Get easy beach waves!
review_text: I have thick in-between wavy and straight hair that is also dry and frizzy. Other curl enhancing lotions I have tried have made my hair feel crunchy, hard and sticky, yuck! Not this one. After I wash and condition my hair I apply this spray to almost dry hair, scrunch it and let it air dry. It gives my otherwise limp, frizzy waves definition, lift and bounce. It even adds shine and smells great, sort of like watermelon. It also looks more natural and is much easier than having to use a curling iron. The spray is easy to use and you can't really use too much of it, which is a problem I've had with other products. In between washes I just spray my hair with water and scrunch it to reactivate the waves.

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Wave Creating Spray: Beauty
title: Raves About Waves
review_text: I always liked the way my hair looks after a swim in the ocean and drying in the sea breeze. Unfortunately I couldn't do that every day but now I can get the look with Fekkai's Wave Creating Spray. The underneath part of my hair has some natural curl and waves. I spray it on damp hair, scrunch and air dry and although it doesn't dry in a toussle of Renaisannce waves and perfect (bong!) ringlets, it really amps up the curls and waves and gives me that beachy look. There' not a crunch factor either although if you keep spraying it on dry brushed out hair the hair can tend to get dryed out. It does add spring and holds well. I don't know how it would work on very straight hair since the top part of my hair doesn't want to respond much. But it works nicely on enhancing what Mother Nature gave you.

product_name: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Eye Recovery Complex 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: Visable result quickly!
review_text: So I was a little suspicious of this product at first; eye creams seem to be the most benign things on the market.  When the beauty consultant put this on my face I let her just to be obliging not really expecting anything.  We continued to talk about her products and I realized that I was feeling burning under my eyes (not painful just noticeable) and she said :"See look it is working already!"  I looked and saw nothing but it felt good and she was kinda high pressure so I bought it.  When I got to the car and looked at myself I could see a definite improvement.  The skin under my eyes was tighter, it was still dark under my eye but without all the baggage it was much improved.  So I think that if I use this product and put my concealer on over it I am going to notice a huge difference.  Highly recommended

product_name: Imju Fiberwig Fiberwig Mascara: Beauty
title: miraculous mascara
review_text:
i'm so happy that this product finally made its way here in the states. i was introduced to this particular brand a few years ago by a friend when i went to visit her in osaka, and i've been hooked since.

i'm one of those unfortunate few who for some reason or the other always end up with "panda eyes" at the end of the day due to mascara run-off. i've tried everything from cheap to expensive, and from regular to waterproof mascaras to no avail. somehow though, this mascara, because of the unique properties of the fibers will not smudge on the skin, no matter how humid or wet the day is. the cool thing about it is that if you rub your eyes the fiber will fall, but not stain the skin, thus eliminating the panda eye effect. the fibers will coat the eyelashes and dry up, forming a sort of tube around the lashes and are surprisingly easy to clean at the end of the day, no special solutions needed. when you clean your eyelashes you can actually see the fibers loosen up and leave your lashes without any residue.

i am also a contact lens wearer and this product, unlike many other mascaras, doesn't irritate my eyes and lasts practically forever.

this has to be the best mascara i have used yet, and that is saying something. even the expensive department store and specialty mascaras pale next to this. and i even bought it at a local japanese drugstore!

never leave home without it; it's possibly the last mascara you'll ever need

product_name: Godiva Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Absolutely Amazing!
review_text: I was a bit weary at trying a Shampoo Bar, but as soon as I took a whiff of this little hockey-puck of sunshine, I was sold.  The scent is strong - so watch out if strong florals give you headaches - so strong, in fact, I can smell the jasmine and honeysuckle wafting out of the shower at this very moment.  When I had it in the bag, fresh from purchase, it scented the entire living room!  The conditioning agent isn't enough for people who use deep conditioners -  I recommend following up the shampooing with a seperate conditioner.  But the Fragrance and ease of rubbing a bit of soap onto wet hair, achieving masses of luscious lather, a quick rinse and go - Priceless!  This is definately a little gem that everyone should try

product_name: T for Toes Dusting Powder by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great for making feet feel nice and fresh... for a whole working shift!
review_text:
I work retail so I'm on my feet for hours at a time.  Throughout the day, my feet sweat (yes, gross I know... but there's no smell), so gave LUSH's T For Toes a try.  I noticed a huge difference the first time I tried it.  For my whole shift, I wasn't able to feel any moisture on my feet at all!!  My feet and toes felt as fresh as it did when I first started work.  

The dusting powder is made with real Tea Tree oil, so it works as an antibacterial agent as well.  It's supposed to handle stinky feet as well, and my boyfriend swears by it.  He works construction and uses it everyday and loves it because it's not girly smelling and even the packaging is not girly, so he doesn't mind leaving it at work.

T for Toes is a wonderful product and you only need to use a real little bit

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Shave like your grandpa did.
review_text: Like most others, I fell for all the hype that convinced me that every couple of years, I had to buy the latest, greatest design in razors.  With each new design, the blades got more and more expensive until I realized that it was just a gimmick to get more of my hard earned money.  About a year ago, I bought a Merkur razor and have not regretted it.  If you are a newbie to this type of razor, you may want to start off slow and make minor changes to your technique.  Then, enjoy your smooth shave and think about what to do with the extra money in your pocket

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Great blades
review_text: I have hard facial hairs (Thanks Dad!!) and after being Gilette user (last used Mac 3), I finally decided to go back to classic style of shaving with Double Edge (DE) razor and blades. Merkur are the first ones I have used after the multi-edge blades and after 4-5 shaves, I am getting closer shaves (w/ no irritation) than by using mutli-edge ones. Also, to get better results, I would recommend a "Badger" brush which really softens the skin before these DE blades with a good heavy razor (Merkur is a good one) can smoothly get your facial stubs. Good luck !

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: Best blades, best price
review_text: This is the second time I have ordered these blades for my husband. He has a very heavy beard and says these are the only razor blades he's ever used that last anywhere near this long, regular blades dull almost right away (sorry he's not here or I'd ask for the details from him, I don't know how long "a long time" is) but at 50, he's tried a lot of blades! He says never buy him anything else again so I guess these are the best!!!

product_name: Merkur Double Edge Safety Razor Blades 3-Pack: Beauty
title: No fuss, no bother, and they work!
review_text:
With the advent of those truly ridiculous multiblade "shaving systems" (oh, no--not "razors"; they're "shaving systems." Feh.), Merkur blades are a welcome standby. They can be had by the full case (20 10-blade packs) for about $80 or $90. And at about a week per blade, even with "two-pass" shaving (once with the grain of the beard and once against it), that's enough for a few years.

I've been using Merkur blades for almost 25 years, and for overall quality and value, I'd say they're the best around. I've found them best when teamed with the Merkur "Progress" adjustable razor. Using both correctly furnishes the best shave next to a straight razor, and without all of the trouble (well, "enjoyment" for the straight razor aficiandoes) inherent in that practice.

product_name: The Body Shop Coconut Shower Cream: Beauty
title: Coconut dream of celestial milky ways
review_text:
This luxurious milky, creamy and rich cream smells like an island made of coconuts, not overly sweet but luscious and truly indulgent, it pours out and can be used with scrubbing gloves ( also sold by The Body Shop) or simply on it's own to envelop the skin in a coat of soft cleansing lather.

This product has actual coconut oil which I also use on it's own, my boss who is a gorgeous Indian woman gets me coconut oil from her local supermarket and she told me to heat it up in the microwave for 15 seconds and then apply to dry hair, massaging into the scalp and letting it sit as long as I can before shampooing out twice to find my hair shiny and luxuriously full of volume and softness. The same oil is really amazing on the skin, not only does it smell like coconut milk with powdered milk mixed together but is wonderful on dry winter days when my skin wants to turn red and be irritated.

Fabulously creamy and comforting this indulgent cream settles me in for a cozy and warm night, because there's nothing better than a warm shower with a great product that makes me want to jump into a clean, fuzzy bed and dream of sweet things.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Clinique 7 Day Scrub Cream Rinse Off Formula 100ml/3.4oz (Tube): Beauty
title: Very effective exfoliator
review_text: This product is awesome; nice texture, great tingling feeling, and very smooth/clean feeling after use. But I'm not sure if you should use it daily, as exfoliators should only be used 2-3x/week because they're too abrasive. So just remember that. Otherwise, this is definitley a top notch exfoliator.

product_name: Ultimate Shine Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Its seriously so awesome
review_text: The 2nd day I shampoo-d with this bar, it was amazing the compliments I received. It made my hair right after going to the salon shiny. I'd highly reccomend this to anyone

product_name: Ultimate Shine Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: My hair did get a little shinier!
review_text:
I wasn't so sure about the claims that this shampoo bar would make my hair super shiny, but I didn't really care either way because it smells very nice and I just like relaxing while I try to wake up (or wind down) in the shower. Anyway, it did make a difference! My hair has been noticeable shinier while using this stuff, though I would try Lush's "BIG" shampoo if you want to see an even bigger difference.

Perfect format for brining with you to the gym or travelling - nothing to spill! Make sure you get one of the little travel tins to bring with you so it doesn't soap everything in your gym/travel bag :)

My only complaint is that it only lasted about a week for me. I have medium-long hair, and didn't use that much. I haven't tried my other shampoo bar yet, so I don't know if that's more of a problem just for this particular bar, or if it's a problem across the board. Read the reviews and find out!

product_name: Ultimate Shine Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: nice but not my favorite
review_text: like all lush shampoo cakes, it does a great job in cleaning hair and is nice and sudsy. I find the smell to be nothing to write home about. Yes, my hair was shiny, but it tends to be with all of their products. Don't be scared of the glitter though, it's barely there.....all in all, I prefer New and Karma Komba to this one.

product_name: NeoCeuticals Antibacterial Facial Cleanser - PHA 4 6 oz: Beauty
title: Good for winter flaky beard
review_text: During the winter months I have flaky skin under my beard and on my face.  This product has prevented that problem the last 3 winters that I've used it.  I'd recomend for that use.  I don't think it has much of a scent at all.  Certainly not like most soaps and skin care products.

product_name: Grass Sea Sponges: Beauty
title: Must have!
review_text: This is a wonderful addition to taking a bath!  The size is very nice, quite large and makes for an awesome spa like exprerience in your own home!  The sponge is clean and has no smell.  Rinses out easily!  Highly recommend

product_name: Clinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup 07 Matte Neutral: Beauty
title: i ordered the wrong one
review_text: when i ordered i didnt read the word double...so when i got it n put it on it was pretty thick and i was like whooa..but its good stuff just heavy for me so im ordering a regular one now

product_name: Clinique Superpowder Double Face Makeup 07 Matte Neutral: Beauty
title: Best No-Foundation-Needed Face Powder Ever!
review_text: As someone who really dislikes making up, but needs a bit of cover in her face powder, I have found Clinique's Superpowder to be just the right product. I have been using it for nearly ten years. In between Superpowder purchases I have tried other lesser brands and have always returned to this product. It is truly no muss, no fuss. No foundation, or concealers, just a nice simple matte powder that sets in naturally. No powdery bits sitting on the skin surface, no flaking ... and stays on all day with nary a touch up ... just perfect

product_name: Curve Crush by Liz Claiborne for Men 4.2 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: oh wow
review_text: This cologne smells great. A guy I know wears it and whenever he hugs me I smell this and well, he smells fantastic. In fact, the way he smelled was one of the first things that interested me in him. I'm a big fan of the original Curve cologne, which smells really nice as well...boys/men can't go wrong wearing either of them

product_name: Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Cognac Oil and Lemon
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
I've heard lots of stories about people using beer on their hair and I will admit to trying it once. Cynthia Sylvia Stout is a much more pleasant experience with beer blended with fresh lemon juice, cognac oil and lemon oil. It looks a little like a chocolate syrup and I didn't think it had a very strong beer scent. 

Strangely enough, the scent sort of reminds me of freshly made whole wheat yeast dough (perhaps with a hint of lemon zest), which is currently baking in my bread baker. This is a very cleansing shampoo that you might want to use when your hair is misbehaving and needs a little shine and control. You may only need to shampoo once since this really cleans well the first time. 

Using this with the Veganese conditioner will leave your hair feeling super clean and not overly conditioned. If you want a deeper conditioning experience, try American Cream conditioner which is simply intoxicating. Please don't make me live without it! 

While I enjoyed using Cynthia Sylvia Stout shampoo, I still think my first love is Rehab shampoo (the scent of Rehab is divine). This shampoo did make my hair feel silky and soft so I'll definitely buy it again. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: I freakin' LOVE this stuff!
review_text:
I am a big Lush fan - but Cynthia Sylvia Stout shampoo is my favorite product!

It does smell VERY strongly of beer when you use it, so if you have an aversion to that smell, you won't like this.  At first I didn't like the smell, but now I think it's sort of a nice "wake up."  I don't smell it on my hair when it's dry as other reviewers have noticed - although I use (non-Lush) conditioner afterwards, so maybe that tends to wash the smell away?

This shampoo makes my hair SO shiny.  I have long blonde hair, and it really makes it glow like nothing else.  I don't know how it does it...but people will literally come up to me and comment on how nice and shiny my hair looks on the days I use this product!  

Oh, and this shampoo is very concentrated - a little goes a long way.  So, think of it as though you're getting twice as much when factoring the price in.  It's still expensive, but I think it's a great product when you need a little splurge

product_name: Cynthia Sylvia Stout Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: Shiny hair promise delivered
review_text: This shampoo totally fulfilled its promise of bright, shiny hair for me. I have nice hair to begin with (if I do say so myself), but I used this in conjunction with one of Lush's conditioners(American Cream)and my friends told me I had shampoo model hair that day. I'm not crazy about the beer-ish smell,which is why I'll give it a four rating.However, it doesn't seem to be very strong once you wash it out and the benefit is worth it

product_name: Dermablend Leg and Body Cover Creme - 2.25 oz: Beauty
title: too dry but stays put
review_text: i have terrible skin, lots of scars, stretch marks, burns, bruises, acne, etc.  but people always come up to me & comment on how beautiful my skin is (due to the makeup). dermablend is way too dry(i like to mix it with a little lotion before applying) but it stays on even in water. if it looks a bit flaky/pale/ghostly put some lotion over it. any type of makeup looks bad if you don't know how to apply it. DUH

product_name: Aromarant Natural Deodorant by LUSH: Beauty
title: this stuff is amazing
review_text: I'm a sort of sweaty type, so I usually like an antiperspirant/deodorant, but sometimes the antiperspirant ingredients give me a rash, and it's really not practical to use them all over everywhere on every single part of your body that might get whiffy. Aromarant is quick and easy to use, doesn't make you itchy or rashy no matter where you use it, and works so well as a deodorant that it makes you want to do an infomercial for it free of charge

product_name: Cellex-C Fade Away Gel 25ml: Beauty
title: OUT, OUT DARN SPOTS!
review_text:
Does anyone remember being told that freckles were beauty marks? Do believe I was told this numerous times as I tried eveything to banish the light spray of freckles across my nose. Well, those nose freckles did eventually disappear but in their place came sun spots on my hands.
Gardening is one of my hobbies, and I love to be out of doors. I know, I know - wear garden gloves. For me, digging in the dirt isn't enjoyable in gloved hands. Hence, sun spots.

Over a period of weeks Cellex-C Fade Away Gel has markedly faded the most obvious spots. It isn't oily so I apply the gel to the sun spots twice a day, in the morning and at night. 

By remembering to apply sunscreen to my hands before going outside I think I'll be able to maintain the beneficial effects of this gel.

- Gail Cook

product_name: The Body Shop Green Tea Home Fragrance Oil: Beauty
title: The Best Smelling Home Oil EVER!!!
review_text: It smells beautiful and is very relaxing. By far my favorite out of so many i've tried!

product_name: Vic's Washcloth: Beauty
title: The most perfect washcloth
review_text: I recieved a couple of these while in college as a gift and have been using them ever since.  Up until now I have aways had a hard time finding them.  I have been usinghte same two for years now and I gotta tell you, washclothes come and go but these still look almost new after all these years.  I am  so glad I can stock up on these!!  Buy them, you will ove them.  I have ultra sensitive skin and these washclothes are outstanding for exfoliating

product_name: Murad AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text:
I love this cleanser!!! I have combination skin and I sometimes have breakouts, especially when I am stressed. This cleanser is great because it sloughs off the dead skin without irritation. I also love how it doesnt dry out my skin! And I have a lot less breakouts now, and when I do, its not as bad as it used to be. Even if you have sensitive skin, this cleanser is perfect, of course there are other great cleanser options if you think this will irritate your skin. Also, this cleanser really helps to minimize/clean out your pores. I really noticed a difference after using it for only a week.
I also recommend the Perfecting Lotion especially if you have slightly oily skin. I use it during the day and even at night(!)because it really improves my skin and I dont wake up with zits in the morning :)Plus, It saves me money since i dont have to by an acne treatment gel to put under my lotion

product_name: Clinique Different Lipstick: Beauty
title: Just about the best
review_text: lipstick going. This review is for the Guava Stain shade. I first bought this lipstick, I believe in the mid to late eighties. I was delighted with it then and am now. It is sheer, light, non greasy and the color never changes. The color is NOT neutral, but I find that I can wear it with almost any color of clothing except primarily pink or red outfits. Over the years it has become just about the only lipstick shade I wear. I would buy different brands,different shades and wear them maybe once then back to Guava Stain. It along with Clinque's soft pressed blush in New Clover, orginally bought about the same time as the lipstick have become my favorites, and the one's I reach for time and again. They are my dependables. Daytime wear for sure, not night, this is a subtle sheer color

product_name: T Girl by Tommy Hilfiger for Women 4 Piece Set Includes: 1.7 oz Eau de Toilette Spray + 3.4 oz Perfumed Body Lotion + Pocket Mirror + Cosmetic Bag: Beauty
title: the person i bought it for love it
review_text: I bought this for a frriend and she love it so, I have to give it 5 since it was not that expensive, the only problem I had was the item was not giftwrap as I pay 2.99 to have giftwrap and it wasn't.  So  the gift wrapping option does not work very well with the seller

product_name: Dr.Hauschka Rose Day Cream: Beauty
title: For a rose petal kissed face
review_text:
For those with dry, tight and thirsty skin or perhaps for any phases and changes in the texture and comfort level of their usually good skin this is the balm of the Gods as I call it. The cream comes in a slick white tube with a gold and orange stripe at the top and can be squeezed out like toothpaste as the thick metal tube lets me get to the very last bit at the end, a total bonus since I hate wasting product.

Expensive, but well  worth it since Dr. Hauschka products are extremely natural and healing in their properties with no harsh chemicals disguised by pink dyes and fragrances. This cream smells like a pale pink Bulgarian rose garden, something I got to experience as a child as it makes me smile twenty years later as I used this cream. Winter and high times of stress or freaky dry skin episodes are the usual scenarios that would require me to use this cream as I usually stick to my favorite green tube of Cetaphil lotion as my day and night moisturizer ever since I got it from my dermatologist who did wonders to my complexion two years ago.

Great as a face cream and also wonderful as eye cream, especially when the computer I use at work always seems to suck any moisture form my eye area right out. This patted right on top of makeup refreshes and plumps up the skin, and only a tiny bit is needed. This cream lasts for months so at this price it's really a bargain considering that what I put on my face always shows up as results or neglect if the wrong product is use.

- Kasia S.

product_name: Coco Mademoiselle by Chanel for Women: Beauty
title: In My Opinion
review_text: Subtle yet powerful! I LOVE this scent. I actually used the entire bottle instead of using half of the bottle, getting sick of it and then purchasing a new fragrance.  Many compliments from men & women. A little spritz does the trick! You can also purchase a sheer moisturizing  body spray. Perfect for daytime wear ~ especially during the summer.  Pricey, but definately worth it!!

product_name: The Art of Shaving Pre-Shave Oil Lavender for Sensitive Skin: Beauty
title: You have NO idea what you're missing...
review_text:
...if you don't use this stuff! After too many years of uncomfortable shaves and having to wait 2-3 days between shaving to let my raw, sore neck recover, I finally started to do some research into what I could add to my regimen/technique to improve results. I read numerous articles about the benefits of pre-shave oil, so I decided to add this stuff to my arsenal...and I'm NEVER going back.

First off, the price might be a detrement to those who are used to $3/can drug store shaving cream, but a little goes a long way, and this little bottle might actually last you longer than 4 or 5 cans of cream or gel. You only use a small amount each day, and it spreads evenly over your whole face. When used in tandem with a good shaving cream, it virtually eliminates razor burn and uncomfortable shaving. My razor glides over my face each morning now. If you look at your razor each morning with disgust like I used to, give this stuff a shot. I guarantee you won't be disappointed. Try their shaving cream and "old school" shaving brush as well. Pamper your face...this is how shaving was supposed to be before cheap aerosol shaving cream and disposable plastic razors started ripping our faces to shreds

product_name: L'Occitane Artemisia Shampoo: Beauty
title: the inside scoop...
review_text: I am actually an employee for L'Occitane (pronounced Lox-ee-tahn; that's the question i get asked every day! lol). I have only been working for the company at their Santa Barbara store for about 2 weeks, and this is what I've learned about the Artemesia Shampoo: This IS the shampoo that ALL Four Season's Carry. The packageing may seem different if you were at a four season's in another country, but this is the ONLY shampoo of ours that they carry (once in a while people dont believe me, but TRUST me- they train us on which one it is).  People come in everyday for this shampoo because they loved it so much at the four seasons.  In fact, the company SOLD OUT and our store (which ran out quickly because there is a four seasons in Santa Barbara) had many unhappy customers because they couldnt find it.  The scent is heavenly and lasting on your hair. Some other products you might want to try out? The four Seasons also carrys our Verbena Shea Soap, Verbena body lotion, and our Lavender linen water (which makes clothes smell great when used in ironing). Also, just to let you know, this week we're getting new products for our Honey line (btw- try the honey body balm- I'm HOOKED) including a cleanser, milk bath, and honey massage nectar. Hope this information helps some of you- Enjoy!

product_name: Happy Heart by Clinique for Women 1.7 oz Perfume Spray: Beauty
title: pleased with my order
review_text: So I've been wanting this particular fragrance for a long time now, and my boyfriend finally purchased it for me for Christmas.  It arrived on time with no problems and also came along with various perfume samples.  What can I say?  It was exactly I expected to be.  No disappointments

product_name: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Leave-In Conditioner: Beauty
title: Great Conditioner
review_text: I bought this conditioner for my daughter's hair.  The smell is WONDERFUL!!!  Plus, the product works GREAT!!!  It now comes with a pump, at least mine did, which makes it easy to use.  It leaves my AA daughter's hair soft and managable

product_name: Carol's Daughter Black Vanilla Leave-In Conditioner: Beauty
title: Good Stuff
review_text: I really like this product. Because I have a natural do, products that are too heavy don't work.  This is perfect for my hair.  It makes it easier to style and it leaves my hair soft and smelling good

product_name: Clinique Acne Solutions Spot Healing Gel 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: Best Acne Gel
review_text: I have tried many different products and this one is the best. I rely on it for many years already and it always works faster than anything else I have tried. Four Stars because it leaves a thin barely but visible film on the skin where you apply it. You can gently blend it with a facial brush after it dries so then its no problem. Especially if under makeup

product_name: Clinique Acne Solutions Spot Healing Gel 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: Great spot treatment
review_text: I use this on the ocasional hormonal breakout and it is super. It is easy to apply, goes on clear and is very powerful. It works to clear up that spot in record time. I'd highly recommend it

product_name: Angel's Delight by LUSH: Beauty
title: Too Sweet!
review_text: Although I find this soap a bit sweet (almost bubble gum sweet), my daughter (teen) loves it.  All little girls would love this especially with the glitter, stars and random colors.  We get it often, the bathroom smells nice after a shower too

product_name: Paula Dorf Eye Color Glimmer: Beauty
title: EYE PLEASING IN EVERY WAY
review_text:
Powdered eye shadows have not been high on my list of must-haves, primarily because they  tended to crease in a few hours and looked a bit artificial.   What a happy surprise to find Paula Dorf's Eye Color Glimmer that comes in powder form but is actually creamy so that it goes on smoothly and does not crease.

	Her line of Glimmer shadows have a hint of gold in them - not too much but just enough for a sun kissed effect.  Another plus for these Glimmer shadows is that they can also be used to contour or line.  For lining simply use a moistened eye liner brush.

	There's a lovely palette of shades to choose from depending upon day or dramatic evening wear.  "Nymph" is an appealing innocent blue, while "Hypnotic" is ready for a night on the town

product_name: Paula Dorf Eye Color Glimmer: Beauty
title: Beautiful Shades
review_text: What a great modern selection of elegant colors and what a perfectly textured eye shadow. Paula Dorf says "Where are the brights? Not here" and calls the shadows "softly muted". That is true but don't take that to mean there is no life to this shadow. It's also named Glimmer and it does have a slight velvety glimmer to it. The selection of very wearable colors has a shade for everyone. I bought the gold, which is subtle but is still gold. I love the way it goes on and it's suitable for day or night. Paula Dorf will never have you looking like a clown but I don't find these shades boring either.

product_name: Chanel Teint Fluide Universel: Beauty
title: Great lightweight foundation
review_text: I absolutely love this Chanel foundation.  It is lightweight and yet provides fair to good coverage.  I like this foundation because it does not feel heavy and it is water-based.  It can be worn in the daytime or evening.  Use with Chanel loose powder and Chanel concealer for a perfectly flawless finish

product_name: MAC LipGlass Lip Gloss: Beauty
title: A MIRROR SHINE THAT DOESN'T DISAPPEAR
review_text:
For a mirror shine and one that doesn't disappear on the rim of a glass with the first sip my choice is MAC. Lipglass feels good on your lips, as if it contained some emollients. And (this is a big AND) it's not tacky or sticky. 

The colors are a veritable palette of shades to suit every mood, occasion and skin tone. They range from a playfully innocent baby-doll nude to a dramatic dark diva red. 

Another plus (and this is a big PLUS following the big AND) MAC Lipglass is so price accessible that you can easily pick a bouquet of these delicious shades. Try adding a Lipglass over a country cousin lipstick for a wow impact. 

Enjoy!

product_name: Takeouts Silicone Bra Inserts 1 set by Her Look Enterprises: Beauty
title: Love 'em!
review_text: Due to the ravages of 60 years worth of gravity, nursing babies, and losing a LOT of weight, the "girls" need a little help. (Actually, they need a LOT of help, but we won't go there!) I have worn bra inserts from the fabric store, the ones that kind of remind you of a shoulder pad. They do the job, but create a line across the bra cup and have to constantly be adjusted during the day. I LOVE the silicone inserts. Iinserted in your bra, they look like the real deal and, since they cling to your skin, they stay in place all day. I call them my "ex-plants!" Love 'em!

product_name: Janson Beckett OkuSil Intensive Eye Serum 1oz: Beauty
title: Fabulous...try it!
review_text: I have tried so many products out there to firm up the area under my eyes and nothing has worked.  Initially I was a little skeptical cause of my lack of success with other products.  I have to say I was very pleasantly surprised.  It certainly has improved the look of the skin around my eyes.  It may seem  expensive, but a little goes a very very long way.  Has a nice texture and easily absorbs and not the least big irritating...and I have sensitive skin.  Try it...I don't think you'll be disappointed.  I wasn't

product_name: Bliss Shock Therapy: Beauty
title: This stuff will REALLY wake you up!
review_text: If you need something to get you going in the morning, Shock Therapy will do it.  We're talking major minty shower gel here--your skin will be tingling.  The smell clears the mind and gets the blood flowing to the brain.  A gift note: this would be a good gift for someone who doesn't like flowery bath products; even guys would like this

product_name: CARGO Liquid Shadow Collection: Beauty
title: Best freaking liquid eyeshadow ever!
review_text: I use this constantly - I've bought every limited edition of the set that shows up at Sephora.  I don't blend it in though, I dab a line across my top eyelid and let it dry.  Not too much, but it's still so vibrant that a little goes a long way.  I've reccomended this to everyone

product_name: Clinique Acne Solutions Concealing Stick Shade 02: Beauty
title: the best acne cover stick I have tried
review_text: This concealer comes in a pencil form, so it is very precise and offers very good coverage.  It stays on well.  It is more waxy and not as soft and creamy as most concealers, so you can put it in a small, precise spot and it will actually stay there.  I have tried many concealers for small blemishes, and this is my favorite.  It comes in enough shades so you can find a good match, which is important

product_name: Bliss Ultimate Foot Duo Kit: Beauty
title: Wonderful!
review_text: I was worried about buying this kit because of the cost, but it's worth every penny.  In less than a week my feet have gone from cracked and peeling to soft and healthy.  This kit is amazing

product_name: Tend Skin: Beauty
title: it works!
review_text: My boyfriend always got ingrown hair on his neck, and he was very skeptical about using this. Now he  doesn't get any ingrown hairs and he doesn't pick at them anymore.  He will not live without it now, and we both recommend it!

product_name: Tend Skin: Beauty
title: try this for pimples!!!
review_text: Tend skin was introduced to me for after waxing ingrown hairs.  But, she said the secret was that it stopped itching from mosquito bites and within 24 hrs any pimple and just blooming pimple are gone!!!  I introduced this to friends at work and now everyone uses it.  We all have clearer skin when nothing else ( even pro-active) didn't work

product_name: Tend Skin: Beauty
title: Excellent
review_text:
I don't know why nobody else likes this product, but so far it's the only one that works for my ingrown facial hairs..

Yes, it stings a bit when I put it on, but it quickly goes away.
It doesn't dry my skin out, it actually helps get rid of the dry, white-looking flaky skin after I shave.

I used to get ingrown hairs so bad on my face that they would be there for MONTHS. Eventually I'd get to the point of having to do my own surgery with a needle to try and extract the hair.

If I get an ingrown hair now, I just use Tend Skin once in the morning and once before bed, and it actually extracts the hair on it's own! It gets rid of the redness and swelling also associated with ingrown hairs.
For the only time in my life my face actually looks clear, and Tend Skin is the product that has done it for me.

Before I finish, I'd just like to add that I'm the kind of person that NOTHING ever works on. Any product I try, never does as advertised. Whether it be shampoo, deodorant, medication, etc.
Tend Skin is one of the rarities that actually DOES work for me.
And believe me, I've tried a LOT of products for ingrown hairs

product_name: Burberry Weekend: Beauty
title: Love it
review_text: The scent is so unforgettable, fresh and sexy and sweet and... it's just the best among the best

product_name: Burberry Weekend: Beauty
title: Exotic
review_text: This is a 'must have' fragrance. It has an exotic scent that will have everyone around you asking "What perfume do you have on?".  It can be worn day or night.  The entire Burberry line is fantastic

product_name: Sephora Indulgences - Carnival Concession Stand Obsession: Beauty
title: Fantastic!!!!
review_text: I'm sooo happy with all 3 of these scents.  The candy apple is definitely the most accurate and I'd sell my soul if I could only continue buying it on its own.  But the other 2 are good, too.  The cotton candy is awesome but not 100% on accuracy and the cherry sno-cone makes me start slobbering when I smell it.  Highly recommended

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Moisturizing Shampoo with Shea Butter: Beauty
title: Shea Butter Shampoo
review_text: This stuff is awesome if you have dry, coarse, or damaged hair.  This is lush, creamy and lathers up well. This is a wonderful luxury shampoo. You will feel like a queen/star when you wash your hair with this. The smells is fresh and yummy. I love using this stuff except I cannot use this every day as it will weigh my hair down. My hair is fine and straight and has some natural wave in the back. I highly recommend this product and will buy it again

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Candle: Beauty
title: Nice Candle
review_text: I originally wanted the Black Ginger Aromatic Candle, but after reading the reviews it seemed that the Red Currant is the all around favorite.  The smell is nice, but I think I expected something a bit different.  The candle's scent does travel throughout my home like others have stated, and it seems to be burning slowly.  The candle itself is fine quality, and comes packaged nicely!  If I found a scent that I liked a bit better I would be 100% pleased

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Candle: Beauty
title: Great Gift!
review_text: I received the Soku Lime candle as a gift and was so thrilled!  The box itself is decorative and I re-used it as a pencil holder on my desk. The scent is very aromatic and long lasting. I had relatives over and they remarked on the scent as soon as they entered my house. I was very pleased.

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Candle: Beauty
title: Excellent Candle
review_text: This candle is the ultimate pleasure! It's smell is not over powering, but is pleasurable at the same time. You will be sure to love it as much as I do!

product_name: Frederic Fekkai Luscious Curls Conditioner: Beauty
title: FINALLY
review_text: I have tried every shampoo and conditioner on the market and was dissatisfied with the results until trying this combo. My curls are well formed and bouncy and I use less styling product. Plus this line smells great! It has a light citrusy smell that I wish they'd bottle into perfume. I even got my boyfriend (who has curly hair like mine) to buy and use these products by letting him sample mine. I am hooked

product_name: Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ Repair Eye Serum: Beauty
title: Excellent skin care product for your eye area
review_text:
When I was a little girl, I would watch my Mother take her makeup off at her dressing table.  Cold cream and soft cloth tissues.  A gentle misting of water and then another dabbing with cloth.  Then night cream, eye cream ("dab on gently, never rub"), a special lotion for her throat and collarbone area.  She would impart her beauty secrets to me while I sat transfixed.  Although I was convinced that she was the most beautiful woman in the world, I was surprised that with all these lotions and oils, she didn't' slide right out of bed at night.  "Exercise, Sweetheart.  Drink lots of water.  Never go to sleep in your makeup--no matter how tired you are.  Never wash your face with regular soap.  Moisturize, moisturize, moisturize.  Your skin has to last you a lifetime and nothing gives away a woman's age like uncared for skin."  While I am not sure where I would even find 'cold cream' today, I follow the vast majority of her regimen.  The two items that I use for under my eyes are Avon's Repair Eye Serum and Hydrofirming Bio6 Eye Cream.  The cream plumps up and firms the delicate tissue around the eye, and the serum smoothes and moisturizes the skin.

I consider Avon products to be the unsung work horses of the beauty industry.  They almost always do exactly what they say they are going to do and at a very modest price.   Expensive boutique and department store products rarely do a better job and are usually exorbitantly overpriced.   When you factor in that Avon products go on sale regularly (which is when I usually stock up), you are getting an even better deal for your money.  While I am not a complete cheapskate, I love a bargain and I want to feel like I am getting full value for my money.

The skin around the eyes is quite thin and delicate, so I think if you follow my Mother's advice and "dab on gently, never rub" Avon's Repair Eye Serum and Hydrofirming Bio6 Eye Cream you will be able to keep this area smooth, without being greasy, even with the most drying of climatic conditions

product_name: Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ Repair Eye Serum: Beauty
title: The best ever!
review_text:
I've been using Avon products since I was a teen.  I started using the eye serum a couple of years ago after Avon discontinued their wonderful eye gel.  I will be 60 this year and have no wrinkles around my eyes and few on my face either, though I am a dry-skinned redhead. 

Contrary to what someone else here said, I find that it does absorb very quickly.  I buy it because it is NOT oily--oily makeup around my eyes makes my eyes burn, and this gives me no problems at all.  Also, I have sensitive skin so I have to use hypoallergenic makeup.  This fills that bill too.  Try it!!  It's great!!

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: Wow!
review_text: I agree with the reviewer who likened it to actual lemon juice.  It is very strong, and I realized after spraying it twice it only needed once... most likely because it is an eau de parfum and not eau de toilette.  Very much worth the money.  I was complimented on it the entire day. It does not resemble lemon Pledge to me at all

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: I found my new perfume!
review_text: I tried the lemon sugar perfume and I am absolutly in love with it. It is like no other perfume I have ever smelled before. I will probably be using it the rest of my life, I hope they never stop making it. I think everyone should try it. The scent is lemony and sugar just like it says. It is light and last a very long time. I am already going to order a bigger bottle tomorrow. Do not just take my world for it, order it today and experience something great and new

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: Impressed
review_text:
I could never expect to like a lemon scented perfume,but this one is definately different.

When i first smelt it in the bottle i thought:"Oh,no!Dish soap!",but when i put it on i immediately loved it.

On me it smells like lemon scented candy.It's so fresh and clean!I couldn't stop smelling my wrist!And everytime i smelt it i felt as if i were in a wet garden and lemon blossoms were falling on my skin!

It was a nice alternative to all my candy scented perfumes.
It lasts a long time too and it's affordable,plus it smells like spring!

The best choise to welcome the hot days of the summer,since it will keep you fresh and cool.

A must buy!

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: Smells just like the shower gel
review_text: This fragrance smells great.  If you have used the awesome Fresh Lemon Sugar shower gel it smells exactly the same.  It smells much better than the other sugar fragrance that has been around a long time.  This one is clean and fresh and uplifting

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: Fresh lemon summer!
review_text: This is a very lemony smell, and the sugar takes away the sour 'edge' of the lemon. It is simply only that-lemon and sugar, then it gets warmer and airy throughout the day.If you want to just try it, get a sample size one from ebay, or a mini perfumes website.If your considering the more expensive Clean fragrance but aren't sure about the price, Fresh Lemon Sugar is similar in scent, the only thing being left out is the laundry, 'air' fragrance

product_name: Fresh Sugar Lemon: Beauty
title: A fresh, clean summer smell
review_text: Not your typical thick, floral-smelling perfume, this perfume smells exactly like its name advertises--like lemon juice mixed with sugar.  It's a seasonal perfume (I can't imagine smelling like lemons in the winter).  It smells very crisp, fresh, and clean, which I enjoy a lot, but I imagine others would not; the same things I like about this perfume, could smell like a cleaning product to others.  Go to your fridge.  Get a lemmon, squeeze its juice out into a cup and add some sugar.  If you enjoy the smell you get, buy this perfume--I highly recommend it.  If not, stick to something more traditional and vanilla/floral like Ana Sui's "Dolly Girl"

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Amazing product. I want 10 more!!!
review_text: I am in love with this product. It smells wonderful once you put it on and it really seems to relax sore muscles. The only problem I have with it is I go through it too fast (I probably use more than I need to).

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: I buy these in bulk...
review_text:
I buy these in bulk, and have done since my darling sister in law gifted me with a boxful of Lush goodies some years back.  

I have terrible circulation.  I get cold and stay that way.  From time to time I'm also an insomniac.  The Wiccy Massage Bar has a cure for both.  The cinnamon leaf is very warming on the skin and the Aduki beans seem to help this warmth penetrate. (They also fall all over the floor if you're not careful...but you wont care..the bar is THAT good). The oil is thick and lovely - but be careful about rubbing up against anything it may stain.  This is one of the reasons I only ever use it before bedtime.  Who cares if it messes up the Cartman Flannel Pajama bottoms?  

Speaking of bedtime...I'm not sure what it is..whether it's the cinnamon or the other essential oils I can't name, but they have a very calming effect.  Much better than yucky smelling lavender.  Helps me get to sleep in no time flat.  

I rub it on the back of my neck and sometimes, even on the underside of my pillow case, for this soft comfy shut eye

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Sore No More
review_text:
After a long day of hunching over my computer at work for 8+ hours and a brutal workout after, I came home tonight and enjoyed the best shower experience I have ever had by myself with a bath bar!  :)  
The cooling sensation of the wiccy magic muscles bar, the cool air in the bathroom, mixed with the warm water of the shower made for a incredibly relaxing, blissful, enjoyable shower.  
I feel great!  I'll sleep great tonight!  This experience has made me a LUSH customer for life

product_name: Wiccy Massage Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Husband loves it
review_text: I havent gotten the treatment myself yet but my husband loves it.  Dont rub it on too long or you'll have too much.  It melts quickly when it touches skin.  I love the peppermint/cinnamon mixture scent and he likes the heat it provides.  It leaves a coating of the buttery stuff on your skin, so wear a shirt to bed so it can soak in and moisturize

product_name: Murad Clarifying Toner: Beauty
title: A good toner
review_text: I bought this after using other Murad products and loving them. I like this, but I wouldn't say I love it. First, it's a bit overpriced. I can get a comparable drugstore product for a fraction of the price. The toner itself is decent, but doesn't seem to clean as deeply as other toners.
