However, for those who find toners to be a bit harsh, this may be a good option. Non-drying and doesn't have that toner "burn". Overall, a decent product, but not one I am sure I would re-purchase

product_name: Creative Nail Design Dry & Shine Quick Drying Topcoat: Beauty
title: I love this product!
review_text:
So glad to find this hard to find item..!  I have tried every kind of polish dryer.. but it did the surface and left a tacky mess underneath .  For Years.. I have used Dry and Shine with the great success.. It goes on like lotion... drys to a haze and you buff it off to a beautiful hard shine...and... dry nails.. 
  I love it!!!  it is magic!!!!

product_name: Happy by Clinique for Men 3.4 oz Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: CLEAN AND REFRESHING
review_text: A Clean and refreshing scent. Not heavy at all - its top notes are citrus based, and this is  appropriate for day or night wear. It is one of my favorites. It reminds me a little of Happy for Women, which I love, but don't wear, because of its distinctly feminine smell. Cudos to Clinique. Happy is a terrific man's cologne, it smells clean but not like laundry soap ( which too many men's colognes smell like these days )

product_name: Bath Ice Cream Triple Scoop Gift Boxes: Beauty
title: Delicious Scoops for the Bathtime Enthusiast
review_text: I have ordered a few of these as gifts and the recipients are always delighted. Responses I have heard about the products are "Marvelous!", "Heavenly!" and "To Die For!"... and keep in mind that these are ladies who take there bath times seriously!!! The range of "flavors" makes it easy to give this gift again and again. The order always comes pre-wrapped suitable for gift giving. You can't go wrong with giving this as a gift. I give this seller my highest recommendation! Kudos

product_name: Safari by Ralph Lauren for Women 2.5 oz Eau de Parfum Spray: Beauty
title: Safari is the BEST!!!!
review_text: I love to wear Safari.  Several times a week someone will ask what kind of perfume I am wearing and comment how nice it smells.  I will continue to wear it until I can no longer get it.  Someone said it is discontinued.  Does anyone know?

product_name: The Body Shop Vitamin E Facial Day Lotion SPF 15: Beauty
title: Good for balanced skin
review_text: My skin was winter dry and I expected this product to have richer moisturizing qualities. The scent is nice, but quite strong.  Not a 5-star product as I usually get at Body Shop, but works fine for more balanced skin

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: Beautiful lasting fragrance
review_text: I love this scent. It smells warm and spicy on my skin.  The eau de parfum is strong, but not overpowering at all and the dry down is wonderful.  It also lasts all day long, which is great because I'm a spray it and forget it kinda gal.

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Parfum: Beauty
title: Azure
review_text: This fragrance is both sexy and playful. It truly embodies the essence of a woman. Both men and women find it to be a truly amazing scent

product_name: CUCINA Dolce Votive Candles: Beauty
title: These Smell Amazing!
review_text: These candles smell true to their names, make the room smell nice, but aren't overpowering. They do smell good when you burn more than one scent, too

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Poured Candle 50 Hours: Beauty
title: Great Scent!
review_text: I light this candle every other day in my bedroom because I enjoy this scent so much.  It is a very light scent, but the smell does fill a room quickly.  If you like the Amazing Grace and Pure Grace lines from Philosophy you will like the "Clean Crisp White" candle. The candle is high quality and comes in a very nice container that I didn't want to throw away.  Great for gifts

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Poured Candle 50 Hours: Beauty
title: Your search is over - this one actually smells when lit.
review_text:
know you. You were me. Looking for what seemed to be a simple thing - a scented candle that ACTUALLY smells up the room when you light it. You've bought the cheap ones in the grocery store that sent out the weak scent of, well, grocery store. And some candles smell like spray room deodorizer which smells like what one would use in the toilet which then make you think of poop which is not at all what you were going for in the living room. So then you hit the expensive pretty versions - perhaps even in candle stores with cute waxy names. They are not candles, my friend. They are sculptures. Some fancy ones come with cute packaging and crispy dried flowers. This is when you lose your patience. I DO NOT WANT CRISPY DRIED FLOWERS. I WANT A CANDLE THAT PUMPS A GOOD SCENT ALL OVER A ROOM WHEN I LIGHT IT.

This is it. Votivo. You will walk into the room and that room will smell like the candle. The most universally loved scent is probably Red Currant. I also enjoy Rain. The little glass it comes in makes a cute vase after the candle is done. Plus, they make perfect last minute hostess gifts, as the box is very nice and expensive-looking.

So, Votivo isn't the cheapest candle in the world. They're still cheaper than buying a bunch of cheap candles that stink...weakly stink.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Best Tweezers Ever!
review_text: Tweezerman tweezers are by far the best tweezers I've ever purchased. They stay sharp for an incredibly long time making tweezing precise, quick and virtually painless. And when they do go dull, all you have to do is send them in for a free sharpening and in a week or so, they arrive back good as new. You can't beat that!

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Long lasting
review_text: I'm sure that you don't need any more assurance, but just to let you know, I've had my tweezerman's for over 5 years now. They are still sharp! Plus if you ever were to drop them, they probably wouldn't be significantly damaged. These tweezers are a must have.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Simply The Best
review_text: Tweezerman tweezers are simply put - The Best - with capital letters!  I bought my first pair at Bed, Bath, & Beyond 2 years ago and I just now broke down to buy another pair because I couldn't even go without them long enough to send them in to be sharpened for free! I tell all my friends (and after one use of mine, they agree) that once you use a Tweezerman you realize that no other tweezers out there even come close to their quality or how well they work.  I have had to fight them out of the clenched fists of quite a few of my friends who have wanted to borrow them. How many times do you make "Rules" for a pair of tweezers?  My number one rule? You can use them, but not take them out of my presence!!  Definitely worth the money - in spades!

product_name: Paul & Joe Blotting Paper: Beauty
title: All-around good product
review_text:
The pictures posted here of the Paul & Joe blotting paper compact don't do it justice. The compact is very beautiful, large and all covered in a pretty flower-patterned material. Very feminine, very stylish, very pretty. My only complaint? I wish it had a snap or something so it'd stay closed instead of only folding...

The price is a bit steep at first but fortunately, they did consider refills at an affordable price. In my experience, I haven't found different brands of blotting paper to be very different amongst themselves and this is no exception, it gets the job done adequately, only in a prettier package...

As far as blotting goes, this one blots shine like it should but get it for the stylish case and the convenience of affordable refills

product_name: H2O Plus Hand and Foot Smoother Retexturizing Seaweed Therapy: Beauty
title: Saved my Winter Skin
review_text: I got this as a gift from my mother last year.  This product saved my hands and feet!  It helped them stay soft.  No more itchy ankles or knuckles.  I preferred to use this at night, but I do use it on my feet almost everyday before I put my socks on for the day.  It moisturizes without too heavy of a feeling

product_name: H2O Plus Hand and Foot Smoother Retexturizing Seaweed Therapy: Beauty
title: very moisturizing i think its the seaweed lol
review_text: i like this lotion it is moisturizing/retexturing but sort of waxy hence the 4 stars but it is still good stuf

product_name: H2O Plus Hand and Foot Smoother Retexturizing Seaweed Therapy: Beauty
title: Better looking hands
review_text: Very moisturizing, and smells nice too.  The sea minerals and exfoliating ingredients keep my cuticles looking good and help cut down on hangnails, too.  I apply lots of it at bedtime

product_name: Givenchy Very Irresistible Givenchy: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: I love this fragance. It's my favorite. No matter where I go, if I am wearing this perfume, I always get compliments. It has a very floral sort of sultry scent to it. I love it

product_name: Givenchy Very Irresistible Givenchy: Beauty
title: Magnificent  Captivating Fragrance
review_text: Givenchy's Very Irresistible is magnificent!  Floral, yet spicy overtones with a touch of black current in a rose peony base.  Better than Bob Mackie's "Perhaps" perfume. And infinitely complex, so that the scent is never tiresome.  Irresistible lasts all day and is a fragrance that captivates.  This perfume is different than the typical scents that arrive on the market and well worth a try!

product_name: Givenchy Very Irresistible Givenchy: Beauty
title: definitely  VERY irresistible
review_text: love love love this scent. i have received many compliments about it. long lasting and definitely addictive. i think its more of a late-fall and winter scent if i do say so myself

product_name: Carol's Daughter Loc Butter: Beauty
title: Fantastic
review_text: This product is perfect for dreadlocks.I buy it whenever I am in the US. I live in the Caribbean and even in the extreme heat this  stuff is the best for my hair type.

product_name: Carol's Daughter Loc Butter: Beauty
title: Great Scent
review_text: I have shoulder length natural dredlocs and while this didn't lock my hair it did smooth out the flyaways around the crown of my head.  It also has a great light scent that doesn't compete with the other hair care products I use like the vanila leave-in conditioner and the hair butter

product_name: Billy Jealousy THE HITS Vol. 1 gift set: Beauty
title: I would give this infinite stars...
review_text: This stuff is sooo great. This three-pack set gives you the creme de la creme in men's skincare. The shampoo is wonderful and actually prevent hair loss. The body wash is my favorite...its smells awesome. The after shave is fantastic...soothing and refreshing. I suggest this pack for those who've never used Billy Jealousy or those loyal followers such as myself...this is also a great was for someone to get introduced to Billy Jealousy, this has all the essentials. You will not be displeased, in fact you'll be in awe...you'll be compelled to tell everyone, this also makes a great gift. Billy Jealousy is the absolute best and I've used all upscale lines from department stores, Sephora, and spas...and this stuff is the best

product_name: Marilyn Hair Treatments by LUSH: Beauty
title: I love it!
review_text: it smells good and made me hair relly soft. It did lighten it a little bit but I also used the blonde with it. After a while I think my hair will get even lighter. Highly recommended

product_name: Marilyn Hair Treatments by LUSH: Beauty
title: This conditioner is fabulous!
review_text: I love this conditioner! It smells divine and it made my hair feel like silk! My hair is ash blonde and i noticed a very slight lift in colour. Regardless, I recommend this product highly, especially for dry, damged hair. I recommend this product in conjunction with "NEW! (Hair) Solid Shampoo Bar", also made by Lush Cosmetics

product_name: Marilyn Hair Treatments by LUSH: Beauty
title: smells divine!!
review_text: I've had my marilyn hair treatment for some 3  months and it makes my hair smell great! Kind of like a smooth scent in my hair. It didn't really lighten my hair, but it smells great, and it did add some extra softness to it

product_name: Happy Heart by Clinique for Women With A Happy Heart 4 Piece Set Includes: 1.7 oz Perfume Spray + 2.5 oz Body Cream + 0.2 oz Perfume Roll-On + Cosmetic Bag: Beauty
title: Only Clinque Scent Worth Buying!
review_text:
Got this sample from a friends mom who worked for a major department store..and I loved it...but I couldn't believe it was a scent from Clinique!

Love that it's light and has little hints of powder and citrus to it.

I definitely recommend this scent...especially for the Springtime.

Great for daytime wear

product_name: Murad Exfoliating Acne Treatment Gel: Beauty
title: It doesn't burn or itch
review_text: The gel has a slight tingling sensation but it doesn't itch or burn and after using it for a few times the tingling stopped. I LOVE THIS STUFF!!! Give it a chance it works great

product_name: Carol's Daughter Tui Herbal Shampoo: Beauty
title: I Love Tui Herbal Shampoo
review_text: I purchased the TUI shampoo and conditioner and although it is watery it lathers very well and leaves your hair squeaky clean. I wear my hair natural with no chemicals and it held my natural curls in place the entire day, my hair did not dry out nor did it become poofy all day. I love Carol's Daughter and I am thankful for her products

product_name: Healthy Sexy Hair Pumpkin Potion Leave In Conditioner with Ginger Root 300ml/10oz: Beauty
title: Worth the price
review_text: I use this conditioner as well as the other pumpkin products. Having bleached hair, I didn't think I'd have healthy looking and feeling hair until I discovered these products. They are worth their weight in gold!  They leave my hair soft,manageable and healthy looking and the smell is wonderful

product_name: Iman Beauty and the Bag: Beauty
title: Great eyeshadows and pencils
review_text: I found Iman lipsticks from the kits to be not as nice as the picture, but the eyeshadows are very soft with high pigments, in beautiful colors; the pencils good quality and very versatile. Overall the kits are a great buy

product_name: Clinique Colour Surge Eye Shadow Duo: Beauty
title: 5/5 Be Mine
review_text: I was so surprised by this eyeshadow. I usually buy cheap brands from the drugstore but when I tested this on my hand I had to have it! Be Mine is a light, shimmery pink paired with a soft charcoal. Pink usually looks weird on me but this shadow is so soft, smooth and lightweight that it glides on and doesn't look cakey. Since I bought this I hardly wear any of the cheap stuff I own. This is worth the price and now I'm saving up to buy a few more shades

product_name: Karma Handmade Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Exciting and Invigorating
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
One whiff of this delicious soap and you are transported to a land of pine trees where plates of freshly sliced oranges are served on a bed of lemongrass, surrounded by patchouli candles. This is the best way I can describe the scent that seems to awaken from the night and mingle with memories of exotic honey and wide-open skies. I am not sure where I go when I inhale deeply, but I am no longer in the shower. Follow this with the Skin Sin lotion and you will enter a little bit of heaven on earth. Also delicious to use in a bath with sea salts and patchouli, orange slices optional, but you might crave the taste of oranges while using this soap. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Karma Handmade Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: I'd like to give it 6 stars!
review_text:
This is my favorite soap in the whole, wide world. It makes me happy when I use it. It smells fresh, like the wind, the ocean, grass, sand. I don't know, it's just the perfect scent. I have both the "karma kream" lotion and karma dusting powder from Lush, and I love them as well, but the soap is still my favorite. Next time I go to their store I'm going to buy the biggest brick of this stuff that I can, because it's great! Just a simple gylcerine-based soap with a dark orange-red hue, but the smell is just so wonderful that every time I wash my hands it turns into some sort of new-age deep-breathing exercise while I try to get as much of that lovely scent into my nostrils as I can.

I've found that this soap lathers better than others, but you have to be careful not to leave it in the shower all the time, or it will get soft and melt away with the condensation. Trust me, you don't want to waste any of this stuff by letting it leak into the drain while other people are using the bathroom! I leave mine out so it can make my bathroom smell really great as an added bonus :)

Fresh, fruity, citrusy, with just a tiny hint of patchouli to give it an earthy note. Definitely a winner from Lush! As soon as I smelled this soap in their store for the first time, I loved this scent. As you can tell from the reviews, a lot of other people do, too

product_name: La Mer The Refining Facial 100ml/3.4oz: Beauty
title: OH MY
review_text: I just love this product, it takes away the dead skin on your face and leaves it sparkling clean , there are little diamond flakes left as well you face looks radiant and young... I will not be without this produc

product_name: Votivo Aromatic Room Mist: Beauty
title: i love this stuff
review_text: worth every penny. someone gave this red currant soap as a house warming gift and i became obsessed. i really cannot tell you how good of quality these products are. the candles burn forever and really scent the place up, but not in an ovepowering fake way. i can't wait until they make body perfume in red currant. all of them smell good however. Cheers from Berkeley C

product_name: Burberry Brit For Men: Beauty
title: Love it despite its musky scent
review_text: Ive never liked spicy or musky scents, but Im in love with Burberry Brit.  Its got a great musky overtone but its not too heavy like most fragrances like it.  The scent sticks around all day which is also a plus.  I've a;ways used light scents like Romance by Ralph Lauren and CK One but Burberry Brit is easily my new favourite...Im actually here to buy my second bottle..

product_name: Burberry Brit For Men: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: This is just incredible. Many subtle layers of scents, non of them too strong or overpowering, despite the fact that this will stay with you all day long ( no need to respray, in other words, so it's a great value for the price ). I had  never tried a Burberry product before and quite honestly bought this on a whim because I was running low on cologne ( yes, I'm one of those types who has to wear something different every day ) and wanted to try something different. I am happy to say there is really nothing I can compare it too - and that's a good thing, it's not "samey" like so many men's fragrances out today, and not feminine at all. Very nice.

product_name: Daddyo Shampoo by LUSH: Beauty
title: One of the Best Lush Shampoos - Body and Bounce
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
If you ever wondered what it would be like to wander in a field of violets, then this shampoo gives a lush interpretation of what it would be like to walk through one of Raymond Gehman's photographs. 

The deep purple color is remnicent of crushed blackberries and the scent is a mingling of lemon, coconut, Bergamot and violets. The truth is, this shampoo is one of the best shampoos Lush sells and I think it gives even more body and texture than Rehab. Use this and follow with the Coolaulin conditioner for shiny bouncy hair that is scented with violets and coconut. 

The fragrance follows you around for hours and envelops you in a comforting warmth. This shampoo may have you dreaming about the Purple Haze gift box filled with violet, lavender and blackcurrant items or looking into the "Gratuitous Violets" soap. 

To complete the experience, you may want the "Smitten" hand cream - quite luxurious and comforting. For some reason, the All That Jas bath item worked well with the violet scent so my house is now scented with Jasmine and Violets and I feel like I'm walking in fields of flowers. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Sympathy for the Skin Hand and Body Cream by LUSH: Beauty
title: Great Idea and great for Summer skin
review_text:
This is alittle "heavier" than usual summer skin products, ie
light, and non greasy, but when you are maintaining your tan and or recovering from skin peeling, this cream is rich and works great!  The ingredients are rich and they really make the skin feel smooth.

product_name: Fresh Sugar Deodorant Antiperspirant: Beauty
title: Lovely!
review_text: This is a treat to wear, I alternate it with my Secret Sparkling Lily clear gel deodorant. The Fresh deodorant doesn't dry my skin and my it rubbery feeling but it keeps me from sweating. It smells just like Fresh's Sugar perfume, sweet and lemony, but doesn't last as long, that's why I only gave it 4 stars. It also doesn't cake or pill up like other deodorants. This is my favorite deodorant

product_name: Chanel Levres Scintillantes Lip-gloss: Beauty
title: Luxurious
review_text: This lip gloss is so wonderful, I don't know where to start.  Long lasting shine, perfect color, goes on smooth-doesn't feel sticky or gummy like some glosses do, mild fruity flavor.  I HIGHLY recommend this lip gloss to anyone-the expense is worth it 100X over

product_name: Clinique Naturally Glossy Mascara: Beauty
title: Contact lens wearers...this one's for you.
review_text: I have been using this mascara for years.  I have tried other brands--drugstore varieties as well as department store varieties and have been disappointed with everything else I have ever tried.  Why?  This mascara is smooth; it does not flake off and fall into your eyes.  It does not ever look clumpy.  It is also easy to remove without losing any eyelashes.  I would not say that this mascara will make your lashes "a mile long" or "dangerously thick" or whatever hype you hear from other brands.  Those kinds only ever look like clumpy mascara.  Just a simple nice, natural looking mascara that won't irritate your eyes

product_name: Clinique Naturally Glossy Mascara: Beauty
title: Natural Lashes with No Clumping!
review_text: This gel-based mascara does an excellent job of creating long, separate, and well defined but natural lashes. If you like your mascara to have some oomph to it, you would want to look elsewhere. For those who can't stand a single clump, you may have found your new favorite! If you've ever gotten a mascara in a slender green tube in a Clinique 'gift with purchase' - this is the one. The one you buy is in a slender and slightly larger silver tube.  You can brush on coat after coat of this gel like wonder and not get a single clump! Wow! This mascara is fiber-free and has been opththalmologist approved for contact lens wearers. The Jet Black is a true black and the Jet Brown is noticeably brown on the wand but looks great on the lashes. As with all long wearing eye makeup products such as mascara, this one needs to be removed with an eye makeup remover.

product_name: Clinique Touch Base for Eyes: Beauty
title: No-crease coverage makes a great base for color!
review_text: I don't remember when I first tried this product, but now I've been using it for years and I love it! This is a great eye color base. It goes on smoothly, without rubbing or pulling the skin, and provides a smooth base for powder eye color. I wear it every day under my eye makeup. It makes my eyeshadow last all day without creasing or fading. Plus it comes in many colors to compliment whatever colors of eyeshadow you're wearing. Try it, and you'll love it too

product_name: Kinerase Lotion 80gm: Beauty
title: Best line of products
review_text: In one month, this product made my skin so smooth and refreshed that a facial scar from six years ago disappeared from my cheek

product_name: H2O Plus Eye Oasis® Moisture Replenishing Treatment: Beauty
title: Another great product
review_text: Instant, non-greasy moisture for the tender eye area.  Smooths out fine wrinkles

product_name: SkinCeuticals Phyto Corrective Gel: Beauty
title: Is there a way to give more than 5 stars?
review_text:
This product is GREAT!!!

I wear it during the day under my moisturizer but the biggest difference is when I put a drop or two on at bedtime. One night I was really beat, too beat to wash my face so I tried putting a little on over everything instead. It worked great. When I wear it at night, my skin looks dewy and fresh and soft like I'm 19 again! (I'm almost 40!) 

I can't say that everyone will have the same results I do. All I know is that I am very, very happy to have found this product!

product_name: Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel: Beauty
title: Clinique Moisturing Gel 2oz pump
review_text: I hsve used clinique moisturing gel for years and this was the first time I had the pump.What a thrill as only a little bit is extracted and that is all one needs

product_name: Bumble & Bumble Grooming Creme: Beauty
title: fyi
review_text: Great product from a company that only offers innovative wonderful products- this product shouldn't cost this much though.  It costs less at authorized Bb. retail outlets and buying Bb. products online doesn't guarantee the consumer that they're getting authentic Bb., so beware.   Check out www.bumbleandbumble.com for authorized retailers

product_name: Chanel Aqualumiere Sheer Colour Lipshine SPF 15: Beauty
title: LOVE SHINE BUT DISLIKE STICKINESS?
review_text:
I love the shine lip glosses offer but really do dislike the stickiness.  When wearing a gloss lip prints come off on glasses (paper cups are the worst!), napkins, and whoever you've just buzzed.

      Found the answer to the stickies with Chanel's Aqualumiere line.  The lipsticks give the slick shine without the telltale spots.  It can be blotted and still shines.  As if that weren't enough it's SPF15.

     My favorite shade is "Macao," a rosy pink

product_name: Jack Black Electric Shave Enhancer 3.3 oz: Beauty
title: Pretty good stuff
review_text:
Only  drawback. It stays wetter on
your face prior to shaving  than the competitive stuff
i.e., AFTA, which dries quickly so you
can get to shaving quicker.

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Incredible
review_text: I like this cologne although my wife uses it mostly. The fragrance is incredible and from time to time I use it as an air freshner as well. It is subtle yet long lasting and I may only recommend it

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: so fresh n so clean
review_text: Inis has a very fresh/crisp/clean scent that I love.  It's kind of a subtle scent and not overpowering, which is what I like about it.  It's also very androgynous so a man or woman could wear it.  Whenever I wear it people always sniff and make comments like "what are you wearing?" and "mmm! you smell so good.

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: Nice, but could be better...
review_text: This is a really great scent, but it could of been better. I think it misses that extra zing you get when you test it on animals.  I mean seriously, animals want to smell nice too

product_name: Inis Energy of the Sea Cologne Spray: Beauty
title: People will comment.
review_text: Inis has become my favourite perfume, every time I wear it I am always being asked "What perfume are you wearing?" It is light, fresh & fragrant, not overpowering but makes an impression. I have tried lots of perfumes but none compare to Inis. The fact it is not tested on animals is a bonus and also it is not too expensive. Can't recommend it enough. Buy and try

product_name: Kenzo KenzoAmour: Beauty
title: Nice bit sweet but gentle and exotic.
review_text: Got perfume for my wife she loves it, me too of course.

product_name: Clinique Facial Soap: Beauty
title: I'm a believer
review_text:
Our local Macy's recently offered free skin typing and the samples to go with it. I really only went to pick up a free moisturizer as I've found with some judicious sampling you don't have to pay for that item. Instead, I fell in love with this soap (and got free moisturizer too-hooray!!)

When the sales rep first handed me the bar soap, I balked. I've known people who've used Clinique but just the idea of washing my face with BAR soap freaked me out. They do offer a liquid version but the rep told me the soap was a better exfoliant. I can't say for sure if that's so but I can say this really is a great face wash. I was addicted after one use. And since it is a bar of soap, you'll get a really great sudsy foam. It has a mild, pleasant scent and it washes off easily. I have the mild version and I just love it. My skin feels clean but never tight and not only does it not cause breakouts, it immediately calmed the one I had. I'll definitely be buying more. 

I do want to add, however, it is drying in the wintertime if you have normal skin and I had to switch to a cream cleanser. It may not be a problem for oily skin. For dry skin, I'd really avoid it in the winter at least.

You still ideally need a makeup remover before the soap. I also became a recent convert to Clinique's Rinse Off Foaming Cleanser. But even if you don't want to use that product, remember that removing your makeup is a separate step.

product_name: Kerastase Resistance Volumactive Leave In Mousse Bodyfying Care Fine & Fly Away Hair 50 ml 5.1 oz.: Beauty
title: Too Expensive
review_text: This is a great product, but way too expensive on this site.  You can find it for $28.00

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Toilette: Beauty
title: Fantastic Scent
review_text: I'd never bought a perfume above ten dollars when I tried Burberry Brit's Eau de Toilette one day. I couldn't believe how wonderful the scent was, especially after it had been on for a while. I splurged on a bottle which seems set to last me for a long time (even with almost-daily use, it's still mostly full). I consider this to be my signature scent, and get many compliments on it

product_name: Burberry Brit Eau de Toilette: Beauty
title: Smooth
review_text: I got this as a gift.  I had tested the Eau de Parfum version at a department store cosmetics' counter and was less than thrilled, however the EDT was just right for me!  I believe in "signature fragrances", so I'll let this be the signature of one of my many moods..

product_name: Dr. Ci:Labo Hibiscus Enriched Aqua-Collagen-Gel Moisturizer: Beauty
title: Hibiscus and Bergamot
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
With the texture of an aloe vera gel, this Hibiscus Enriched Aqua-Collagen-Gel smoothes over the skin effortlessly and penetrates the skin to create some stunning results. Not only will your complexion improve, your skin will firm and tighten to reveal a renewed tone. 

The secrets in this formulation include Hibiscus flower extract, Hibiscus fruit extract, Citrus Junos Peel Oil, Bergamot Fruit Oil, Orange Oil, Collagen and Allantoin. This gel is perfect alone if your skin is combination to oily or can be used along with another moisturizer if your skin is dry. The ingredients seem to balance and soothe the skin and also encourage an anti-aging effect. 

The firming and toning of the skin is truly amazing. This is one product you won't want to live without and you can alternate the various Dr. Ci:Labo Collagen Gels to gain the full benefits of each. 

The Super Moisture Moisturizer is also perfect in the driest of winters and would seem to be essential when living in desert conditions. The Super Moisturizer contains Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe, Lobata Root Extract, Flower Extracts, Grape Leave Extract, Sea Salt and Horse Chestnut. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Komenuka Bijin All-Natural Face Care Set: Cleansing Foam & Moisture Cream: Beauty
title: Dreamy Cleanser and Soothing Moisturizer
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
Rice Bran is the secret to these products and the results are immediately apparent in the texture of your skin. After just one to two uses, you start to notice a sense of calm and order descending upon your formerly sensitive skin. Weeks later you look at your skin and it seems like you are at least ten years younger. The smoothness, clarity and youthful glow truly shows with continued use. 

If you have oily or combination skin, you may be amazed at how balanced your skin is and how you no longer experience the shine breakthrough in your makeup due to the initially drying aspects of other cleansers. 

The Komenuka Bijin Facial Cleansing Foam is very economical and an eighth of a teaspoon is enough for a wonderful face cleansing experience. The ingredients include: Rice Germ Oil, Rice Bran, Coconut Oil, Seaweed, Aloe Algae, Ginkgo Biloba, Matricaria, Yeast, Perilla Ocymoides, Honey, Lithospermum and Fountain Water.

The Moisture Cream goes a long way. The main oils are Rice Germ Oil, Jojoba Oil and Olive Oil. Vitamin E, Rice Bran and Aloe make this a skin-healing treat.

Other products to fall in love with: 

Cleansing Powder - Packets of deep cleansing grains turn silky and creamy when you add water. 

Makeup Remover - A fragrance-free cream that removes makeup and mascara. Based on olive oil. 

UV Cream - Slightly tinted and waterproof, this sunblock also seems to even out skin tone. Could be used as a makeup base if you are looking for a more natural look. 

Hair Shampoo & Conditioner - Thickens fine hair instantly. Removes buildup and leaves your hair feeling luxurious. 

Essence - This is a product that is magical. It can be used for skin healing and it also lightens freckles and age spots. 

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Komenuka Bijin All-Natural Face Care Set: Cleansing Foam & Moisture Cream: Beauty
title: Amazing
review_text: Used the cleansing foam, then bought the moisture cream.  Whatever is in rice bran is truly wonderful, it cleanses without any dryness and a rosy glow has returned to my skin. Have stopped using my old department store stuff, replacing 4 of those products with just these 2 with better results. Good value on both, they should offer a deal on the shampoo and conditioner too

product_name: philosophy falling in love perfumed fragrance solid: Beauty
title: philosophy falling in love
review_text: I love the smell ... and I much prefer the solid perfume to the spray ... just subtle enough ....

product_name: philosophy falling in love perfumed fragrance solid: Beauty
title: Subtle and Warm
review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance.  When I put this on, I get a warm musky scent that lasts for hours.  I put the spray cologne version of Falling in Love on top to brighten it up a bit when I feel like it.  It is subtle, but I think it is a very sexy and warm scent and not at all overpowering.  Definitely something my husband wants to be near

product_name: Hot Milk? BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Pleasantly Surprised...
review_text: I was unsure about this item in the store- but took a gamble. I cut 1/3 of the bar up and crumbled it and I wasn't particularly impressed with the smell of it dry. So I grabbed the rest and tossed it all in. Wow! It was so silky and smooth against the skin, I jumped out and grabbed my husband to join me! With some nice classical music on in the background and a Tahitian Vanilla candle- you'll think your back in the womb- all safe and warm. The bubbles didn't last very long, but it leaves the skin silky and comfortable with out a perfumey scent

product_name: Hot Milk? BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: non-floral option, plus it smells like kids bubble bath.
reviewer: ilex q. "songstress, piano technician, and espresso junkie extraordinairre"
review_text: my first thought on crumbling some of this into my running bath was that it reminded me of bubble baths from when i was kid. there's this really nice subtle clean smell to this bubble bar. i really like that it's not an overpoweringly smelly bubble bar. it's great for those who don't want a flowery bath, but who can't tolerate the overwhelming patchouli in the blue skies bar. i wish i'd bought two of these instead of one of this and one of the blue skies. plus, this is a good bar for mixing with a bath bomb. really probably any bomb would do. good stuff

product_name: Hot Milk? BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Wonderful bedtime bath
review_text: This was my first Lush experience and now I am hooked. Something about the scent of this bubble bar relaxes me like nothing else. It didn't smell like hot (coconut) milk to me - it has a warm, spicy, pleasant scent - but it definitely had that "warm milk before bedtime" effect. And it works miracles on my rambunctious two-year-old daughter. Not only does it produce LOADS of bubbles (fwiw we have an oversized clawfoot tub, and a third of a bar filled it to the top w/bubbles) but the scent seems to calm and relax her as much as me. Warning: don't take this bath if you're planning an evening out! You'll just want to snuggle into bed afterwards

product_name: Hot Milk? BUBBLE BAR slice by LUSH: Beauty
title: Decent
review_text: Bubbles nicely but does not smell like "hot milk". I've never tried milky bar so I have no idea if the two compare. Hot Milk? IS comforting though. Its like being wrapped in warm fluffy towels straight from the dryer

product_name: Ooh La La Natural Soap by LUSH: Beauty
title: Calling all Lavender Lovers
review_text: This is the one for you. I love love love lavender.  And this soap is it.  Concentrated lavender goodness. Very dark purple in color and complex in scent layering.  Wonderful light texture to soap

product_name: Philosophy Oxygen Peel Kit Kit: Beauty
title: ACNE SUFFERS MUST GET THIS
review_text:
I developed acne after I turned 23 and have had limited success using over the counter products. I purchased the acne kit and it began to clear up my skin, but I would still get the cysts that took for ever to go away or they would never get to the surface. I starting using the oxygen peel one a week and found that it wasn't doing much and that there was a lot of extra get that I had made that was wasted. I talked to the girl at the counter several days ago about this and I had a huge cyst that was very painful. She told my to use the oxygen peel 3 times in a row and that should help. I would be using all the extra gel that was made and would see more results. 
I went home that night and did just as she said. I was amazed to see that the painful cyst had risen to the surface and I was able to relieve the pressure. This is a truely amazing product and would recommend it to anyone who has this same proble

product_name: Laura Mercier Illuminating Stick: Beauty
title: FOR A NATURAL GLOW
review_text:
For a touch of the sun without risking  skin damage the always innovative and practical  Laura Mercier came up with the "Solar Flair" Collection.

	One of my favorites in this line is the Illuminating Stick, an easy way to achieve an instant glow.  The stick is available in two shades, Golden Honey Glow, which provides a subtle bronze luster, and Golden Rose Glow, which very much resembles a natural blush.

	With earth minerals for a lovely luster and shine, the color is applied directly to the skin with fingertips or brush.  It blends smoothly and leaves a soft, velvety texture.

	There's no limit to where it can be used - as a blush on the apple of the cheeks or across forehead, brow bone or chin for a "just in from a day at the beach" look.  For evening my preference is the Honey Glow applied across shoulders as well.

	Key ingredients include Vitamin E, Vitamin C, Vitamin A, and Bismuth Oxychoride, which acts as a light reflector by sun or moonlight

product_name: Merkur Progress Double Edge Safety Razor: Beauty
title: All-around best razor
review_text:
Having shaved with everything from cheapo disposables to Thiers-Issard straight razors, I have to say that the Merkur Progress is probably the best all-around razor available today. It has excellent heft and balance, and the adjustment feature is simple and straightforward. (Although I do agree that the numbered adjustment seems to perform a little differently depending on the blade used.) It is easy to keep clean--assuming you don't mind unscrewing it and taking the blade out to wipe off the head and frame. Having also used a venerable old Gillette "fat boy" from the 1950s, I'd still have to rate the Progress as a better razor; the screw operated adjustment makes it constantly adjustable, not just in steps. 

Since this is a safety razor, its performance is significantly dependent on the blades used. I've tried both the Merkur blades and the Japanese "Feather" blades, and would say that it's a toss-up. 

And since it is an adjustable safety razor, it is perfectly suited to two-pass close shaving. A higher setting is excellent on the first pass with the grain of the beard, and a lower setting for the pass against the grain. The adjustment also allows you to adjust the razor to the conditions of your skin and beard. If you've let yourself get a day's worth of stubble (c'mon--don't we all?) you can set the blade high to mow that hedge. If you need a quick clean-up before a night on the town, you can set it lower for a "Once lightly, James."

So if you want a really well-made, no-nonsense but very versatile razor that will last for a good long time, this is a good bet. The only problem might be preventing pals from swiping it, or reminding your wife/significant other to take it apart to clean it after she smooths up those pretty pins you love so well.

One recommendation: Shop around. You can get these for under $40.00 if you bargain-hunt, likewise full 20-count boxes of carded Merkur 10-blade refill sets

product_name: Fantastic Four Bath Bomb Gift Set by LUSH: Beauty
title: This stuff smells great!
review_text: I bought this on a whim because I just remodeled my house after Hurricane Katrina and now have a huge jacuzzi tub...nice to take long baths in so of course I needed some bubble stuff.  The bath bombs smell wonderful.  My whole bathroom smelled of the bath bombs until I used them all.  I even put the box they came in into my closet and it made my closet smell wonderful (for about a week)!  The bombs each have something special inside of them that you find out about when they dissolve.  The fizzing is fun and the smell lingered on my skin until the next day.  I loved them and will definitely buy more

product_name: Tarte FRXtion: Beauty
title: My Lip Fix for Sweet, Kissable Lips
review_text:
This was my fisrt foray into lip scrubs.  I like the dual concept, with a scrub on one side and a lip balm on the other.  I also like the fact, this slips into you purse or pocket easily, so it's convenient for those on the go.  I took mine skiing in Vail, and it was the first time I didn't come home with chapped lips. 

The textures are good.  The scrub side is slightly grainy, more of a polish than a scrub.  I would not recommend it for heavily chapped lips, but it works well for weekly maintenance. The lip balm side is a little waxy, but moisturizing with vityamin e.  It's quite long-lasting and provides a sweet, natural shine.  This smells of spun vanilla, sweet and sugary. 

Why only 4 stars?  I think Tarte should have added SPF 15 sun protection.  Doing so would provide sweet, kissable lips and the protection you need

product_name: Tarte FRXtion: Beauty
title: Love the scrub, and the balm is great, too.
review_text:
I got this as a present, when it finally came back in stock.

The scrub part of the stick does a great job, but you need to have lips that aren't in dire need of help for it to really work.  To do that, just use a moist, soft toothbrush, and gently scrub.  The scrub side will sometimes leave a little sugar behind, so you might have to wipe your lips off a little after you use it, but I found that this doesn't happen all the time.

The balm side goes on smoothly, and feels great.  It's silky feeling, but does not provide a lot of moisture, so, if you lips are on the dryer side,  this is not going to replace your regular gloss.

This stuff is great for on the go, and I will be buying it again when mine runs out

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: Happy for Men smells good!
review_text: Forget all those other so-called good colognes out there. Happy for Men is the best smelling one of them all! It may be expensive, but it is well worth it. Example: I sprayed down a shirt with it and send it home with my girlfriend at her request! She requested this because she wanted have something of mine that she could sleep with it while we are apart. That is how good it is! Enjoy

product_name: HAPPY For Men By CLINIQUE cologne: Beauty: Clinique
title: A distinct scent...
review_text: for me, Happy has a subtley orange undertone and evokes a sense of vibrancy and youth. As with the signature female clinique scents, you don't need much to cause a stir and it always leaves a lingering, subtle trail of sophistication

product_name: Kerastase Masquintense for Very Dry and Fine Hair - 16.7 oz 500 ml: Beauty
title: Worth every penny - your hair will fell like silk & smell great!
review_text:
I'm not kidding, it's worth every penny (though I must admit that I get it at a lower price from a secret supplier in Asia). After using this, you'll swear that you just got a hot oil/deep treatment done from a professional salon. 

I have chemically treated hair (relaxed, double process - colored & fine hair equals damaged hair), and this is the only conditioner that works for me. Another plus is, this is the only conditioner that elicits "your hair smells sooooo good" reaction from my boyfriend & daughter.

Surprisingly, even if it moisturizes my hair excellently, it still leaves it bouncy & with enough volume.

This lasts about 6 months if you use it once a week, so it's really not that expensive, especially if you substitute this for your regular deep conditioning treatment at the salon.

If you're still wary, try a smaller bottle

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Luminous Green
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The Avobath bath bomb turns water a lovely luminous pale green. Avocado, olive oil, lemongrass, bergamot, rosewood oil, gardenia extract makes this a skin calming, soothing, moisturizing dream. The "green luster" makes this bath especially beautiful and gives it a mermaid mood. I loved this one so much, I'm ordering two the next time. 

The scent is lemon/lime, but by the time you get in the tub, the floral scents are more prominent. You can add in some bubbles, but they don't seem to last very long - well, I was using a bath gel. 

So, you may want to find a bubble bar because the olive oil seems to make them disappear pretty fast. At least, that is my theory because I've noticed bath oil does the same thing. Avobath goes well with Whoosh products or the Happy Hippy Shower gel. If you are in the mood, you might want the amazing "Godiva" shampoo and conditioner 2 in 1 bar (has a magical quality - makes hair super shiny) or the "I love Juicy" shampoo and "Veganese" conditioner. The last two also have a citrus scent and are especially delicious. 

When I use Lush products, I'm in a good mood all week long. It is truly amazing how happy and content I am as long as I have some Lush products around. :)

~The Rebecca Review

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: An uplifting lemongrass fizzer!
review_text:
This cheery green bomb releases the uplifting scent of lemongrass blended with some other elements that make it well-rounded and fruity - the reviewer who likened it to Froot Loops cereal wasn't too far off base! Add a sizzling lemony-herbal top note to Froot Loops and you have this bomb's scent.

Since lemongrass oil is good for uplifting the spirits, this is a great bomb for those tired or grumpy days we all have sometimes.

There is the mildest shimmer to it, that you really have to look for in the water itself, and it gives the lime-green water a lovely depth and sparkle. But it isn't glittery and you won't end up with anything you can see on your skin. It is more an in-bath pony trick!

This is a great bomb for cheering you up on a wintry day, and one I keep a small supply of and use often

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: IT'S NOT EASY BEING GREEN, UNLESS.....
review_text:
As we've heard, it's not easy being green.  It's more than easy, it's delightful if you're an Avobath Bath Ballistic.  Infused with avocado (hence the name) and olive oil it moisturizes skin.

     The fragrance is fresh,  rather citrusy, thanks to lemongrass and rosewood.  Bath water is a lovely shade of green, rather like new spring grass.

      If there's glitter in it I didn't find any, which was as I wished.  It's suggested for morning - I'd relax with an Avobath any time of day

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Sparkly citrus
review_text: I love the fresh scent of the Avobath, there's just nothing like it. It smells like springtime to me. I have yet to notice any glitter in an Avobath bath (and I've taken about 10) so if you're glitter shy, don't let that stop you from trying this one

product_name: Avobath Bath Bomb by LUSH: Beauty
title: Avocado Bath Heaven
review_text: I like to eat avocados, I like avocado face masks, and now I can bathe in eau de avocado!  This bath bomb is possibly my favorite - very softening, great color (turns your tub into a nice green lagoon), and great lemony scent.  I didn't find the glitter to be very noticeable, so don't worry about that.  Stock up on this one

product_name: Kai Gift Set: Beauty
title: Heaven full of Beautiful Flowers
review_text: Kai is like lying in a meadow in the warmth of the sun, with a gentle breeze, and the aroma of a million sweet flowers embracing you. Oh, how I love it

product_name: Sugar Cosmetics I Scream 4 Sugar Mini Lip Gloss Set: Beauty
title: Sweet!^_-
review_text:
O.k,these glosses are just plain yummy!

Actually,they don't taste like lipglosses at all,which is a good thing.No one wants waxy or 
chemical flavored gloss that 
makes you want to throw up,right?

All the flavors are amazingly delicious.Each one tastes just like sweets.

The colors are sheer and radiant without looking cheap or tacky.

They go with any eyeshadow or blush color and make your lips sparkle.

I wish the  tubes were just a bit bigger and the glosses were less sticky.

Overall,nice glosses but a bit overpriced for such lil tubes

product_name: Sugar Cosmetics I Scream 4 Sugar Mini Lip Gloss Set: Beauty
title: Yum!
review_text: I am absolutely addicted to this lip gloss. I own over 300 different brands of gloss, and this is by far one of my favorites. It's a pretty good deal, at only $28 for so many colors. I like the small size because it easily fits into any evening bag or pocket. It's fun to layer the different colors as well, and there are an infinate amount of combonations between all of the different colors and flavors. They also taste amazing, each embodying a yummy taste exactly like sugar. It goes especially well with the Aquolina Pink Sugar fragrance, for a sugar-themed cosmetic experience

product_name: Lancome Primordiale Optimum Eye 15ml/0.5oz: Beauty
title: i love it
review_text: I bought this cream after I tried about a dozen other brands and I loved it. It a bit pricy but it worth every penny. I am 24, so I bought it to smooth out starting lines that i had and prevent new ones. It worked! Now I look like I am 20 again

product_name: Burberry Burberry London: Beauty
title: Burberry London- I'm a Convert
review_text:
Was using philosophy's various light scents, discovered this Burberry London sample in my last Sephora shipment. Went to Macy's and bought the set for under $77-lotion, shower gel and 3.3 oz fragrance. Fretted over price until I actually used the products-layering them. Recieved SO many compliments! Not "an old lady's perfume"- not strong nor weak- it has an elegant floral fragrance. 
top notes: rose, clementine and honeysuckle.
heart notes: tiare flower, jasmine and peony.
dry down notes: sandalwood, veil of musk and patchouli. All my favorites

product_name: Burberry Burberry London: Beauty
title: Light and Fabulous
review_text: One of the best perfumes I have tried in a long time... my boyfriend goes crazy over it

product_name: Reincarnate Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Amazing!
review_text:
I've tried several shampoo bars and had finally given up hope that I could ever use them - they had always left my hair feeling gross and gummy - no matter how much I rinsed or tried vinegar/water mix rinses after (as was suggested).
But - this one had had some good reviews so I gave it a go. It was awesome! It lathered rather well, and rinsed out very easily. I used it in conjunction with the american cream conditioner - and my hair's very very silky and soft right now. (it had gotten very course over the period of a week with using avalon organics shampoo and conditioner)
I'm excited - now that I've finally found a shampoo bar that works, I can finally say goodbye to bulky shampoo bottles and same some space

product_name: Reincarnate Solid Shampoo Bar by LUSH: Beauty
title: Smells /so/ good.
review_text: Reincarnate can be a hard shampoo to get used to, especially if you're not already using LUSH products. It doesn't 'sud up' much, and feels a little bit muddy and grainy. Don't fret though! It will certainly clean your hair, and will also leave it smelling like wonderful spices (almost as good as "Arabian Bright"). The highlights are not something that come with one or two washings, but with many many washings, and they are /very/ subtle but there. The only reason I don't give this product five stars is that it was not as conditioning as it states it is, and I needed to use another conditioning product with it

product_name: Bliss Glamour Gloves: Beauty
title: So Soft
review_text: I bought these with the also great socks and was completely pleased by the way they left my hands, hydrated and soft. After leaving them on for half an hour with the Glamour Gloves Gel my hands felt reborn. I couldn't get over how the moisturizers had penetrated. I've had these for a couple years and was almost sure they would stop working but they're still doing the job. I've recently seen less expensive gloves on the market and don't know how well they work but these are very high quality

product_name: Comptoir Sud Pacifique Vanille Abricot: Beauty
title: Awesome Sensual Fragrance
review_text: I first caught a waft of this fragrance in a magazine as a tester. I fell in love with the sweet, sugary light smell of it and so did my husband. It's perfect for all seasons since it's light and it definitely makes people ask you what you're wearing. I've been told it smells everything from edible to kissably sweet. Now I want to try some of their other fragrances. If they are half as good as this, they win in my book

product_name: Hylexin (Serious Dark Circles?) .78oz: Beauty
title: Awesome stuff
review_text:
I have been using this product for about 3 months.  It is great!  Not only have I noticed a difference, but I get comments from people all the time about how refreshed I look.  I had a baby about 5 months ago and decided that I need to pamper myself a little.  I came across this product in January and was very cautious about purchasing another eye cream.  Nothing has worked in the past.  However, I decided to give it a try.  I noticed changes after a couple of weeks, but wasn't sure if it was just me wanting it to work or it actually working.  Well, now after 3 months, I can totally tell the difference.  I look so much better even without makeup.  I don't even need to put concealor under my eyes any more!!!  Plus, I receive so many great comments from people.

Thank you Hylexin.  Finally something that worked for me

product_name: Bobbi Brown Bronzing Powder: Beauty
title: Best bronzer I've ever used
review_text:
This is the first bronzer I actually finished. This gives the most natural finish and blends really well. I like that it's matte because I'm not a fan of sparkly bronzer. Ever since I started using this, I'm just addicted and can't live without it. It gives the skin a really natural, healthy-looking flush.

I've got medium/olive skin and I use "Light". My skin doesn't look orangey or dirty. Try it and I'm sure you'll like it. Make sure you use a really good brush.

product_name: Kai Perfume Oil - 1/8 oz: Beauty
title: Memories of Hawaiian Gardens
review_text: I love this fragrance!  It reminds me of some of the most beautiful and fragrant flowers of Hawaii.  If you've ever visited The Islands and smelled a pikake lei or walked past luscious jasmine bushes, and thought to yourself, "What is that heavenly smell?"  THIS IS IT!  There is not a scent out there on the market that evokes such memories and enjoyment as Kai.  My only concern about this fragrance line is the $cost$, but how I feel and think when I am wearing it makes it all worth it

product_name: SkinCeuticals Ultimate UV Defense SPF30: Beauty
title: Great sunscreen although a bit expensive
reviewer_location: SF Bay Area, CA United States
review_text:
While most sunscreens these days protect against sunburn, did you know that very few of them actually protect against photodamage? Only two sunscreen ingredients protect against the long UVAI rays that cause photodamage (brown spots, wrinkles, etc); zinc oxide and Parsol 1789. Zinc Oxide protects a broader range of these rays than does Parsol 1789. 

This Skinceuticals sunscreen has zinc oxide and it goes on without any white film or greasiness-perfect for daily use on the face. While Neutrogena Dry Touch suncreens feel more invisible on the skin (you can't even tell it is on except for the smell) and is a good alternative (has Parsol 1789), I still prefer the Skinceuticals for the added protection and virtually no scent whatsoever. Since it's expensive, I tend to use it just on the face and use a cheaper (like Neutrogena) sunscreen on the body when out in the sun.

product_name: Shiseido Pureness - Matifying Moisturizer Oil-Free 50 ml/1.7 oz: Beauty
title: This product is amazing
review_text: This mattifying moisturizer is GREAT!  It definitely helps with my oily skin and works all day long.  I can't say more than enough positive effects this moisturizer has had on m

product_name: Zhen Light Diffussing Foundation w/SPF 8: Beauty
title: Very good quality for a good price
review_text: I am satisfied wih both the product and the delivery time. I would order it again

product_name: Zhen Light Diffussing Foundation w/SPF 8: Beauty
title: Qualtiy foundation for moderate prices!
review_text:
This foundation provides a flawless finish and natural look, while also giving a good coverage.  I've been using this foundation for years, all year long, and it is one of my favorites.  Not too heavy and not too light, it's the perfect foundation.  

Being Asian American and with a light complexion, finding a good color match had always been a problem unless I spent $40 for a bottle of makeup.  Zhen is one of the best deals around - clean but stylish packaging with a superior product inside

product_name: Tweezerman Fast Lash By Tweezerman (Alcone): Beauty
title: Look out Bambi!!!!
review_text: This product is truly amazing!  The application method can be a bit tricky and the performance varies depending on the type of mascara you use, but if you follow the directions and find a good mascara formula then you WILL have long, long lashes.  My lashes are medium length, but when I use this people who know me thing I am wearing falsies.  This stuff rocks!  I've never been able to find a mascara that can do what this does

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: You get what you pay for...
review_text:
Is so true of this product.  I have to admit when I first saw the price tag of this product, it was half out of curiousity that I purchased.  I mean could a pair of $20 tweezers be THAT much better than the ole $1.75 or $3 pairs at home?  

Well if your asking yourself that question, YES!  These things have amazing grip and can pull the tinyiest of hairs.  Things that you would have to dig with normal tweezers until you finally rub your skin raw.

Without a doubt, you will get your moneys worth from this product as well as be amazed at their performance.  It's the type of "WOW" that makes you feel like, "How did I ever get along without these before".

Worth every penny and I'll never buy another cheap tweezer again.  These have lasted for years and still retain their fine point.

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Best tweezers I've EVER used!!
review_text: I had an Amazon reward certificate and was looking for something practical to use it on.  It so happened that I needed new tweezers.  I read the reviews and thought I'd give these a try.  Wow, I can't believe the difference in quality from any other tweezers I have ever owned.  They almost seem to adhere to whatever your are trying to grasp.  It is so easy to precisely and almost painlessly remove even the finest eyebrow hair.  Tweezerman Tweezers ROCK!

product_name: Tweezerman Slant Stainless Tweezer in Colors: Beauty
title: Long lasting
review_text: I'm sure that you don't need any more assurance, but just to let you know, I've had my tweezerman's for over 5 years now. They are still sharp! Plus if you ever were to drop them, they probably wouldn't be significantly damaged. These tweezers are a must have.

product_name: LORAC Croc Palette: Beauty
title: The Best
review_text: I purchased this one month ago and I will never use anything else. Blends wonderfully, great colors. I bought it for my daughter from amazon/sephora as well. Great product

product_name: Boscia Fresh Blotting Linens: Beauty
title: These are a summer necessity
review_text: These are great for removing excess oil when you can't stop and wash your face or don't want to disturb your makeup.  I prefer this brand because they unfold to twice their size when you pull them out instead of the size of a half-dollar like the rest of them

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession: Beauty
title: Still a Hit!
reviewer: Jeannette Davis "Mom to Carson, Parker, and Wyndser"
review_text: I have been wearing Obsession since 1986, and it has definitely not gone out of style.  Every day I get a comment from someone about how good I smell.  My boss even bought some Obsession for his wife because he likes it so much on me.  This is my favorite perfume

product_name: Calvin Klein Obsession: Beauty
title: This is an obsession
review_text:
I have been wearing ObsessionÂ® by Calvin Klein since it was first launched in 1985, the year I first arrived in California. It seems I am one of those people forever stuck in a time warp and prefer this classic instead of trying new scents. While I prefer the eau de parfum spray I have both variations. Although at first this tends to have a strong aroma, this doesn't last after being applied to your skin. I love the blend of vanilla, mandarin orange, peach and lemon that make up the scent of ObsessionÂ®.

My preference is more of a racy, provocative, alluring scent instead of brimming like flowers. With my skin irritations, asthma and allergies I have no problems with spraying my body parts with ObsessionÂ®. The color is quite appealing, reminding me of Spiced Rum with the brown, amber and gold tones. ObsessionÂ® cologne is suitable for both day and evening wear, indoors and outdoors and those luscious intimate settings. 

This is definitely a feminine scent, sweet, sexy and not too fruity or powerful.   There is a gold toned rim with the cap snapping on and pulling off most of the time with ease. Sometimes the lid does not go on just right and then the cap part becomes undone and this makes two pieces.

Once the scent has set in for awhile on my skin I detect a hint of floral with wood combination and have read on fragrance.net that ObsessionÂ® has oriental spices. It really is a winning combination that has captured my interest over the years. This is a scent that is recognizable by men and women and can be worn through out the seasons. 

I would not say this is a musk scent but more of a spicy tingle that needs to be only administered once a day for long lasting appeal. The appeal of ObsessionÂ® seems to run from girls in their early twenties to those of us in our early forties, from conservative ladies to party animals. 
 
Although it is a darker color than most fragrances, there is no staining on clothing, but I do not wear sweaters, whites or turtlenecks. When I do use the glass jar I have noticed frequently when standing over the sink the yellowish/brown tint left in the sink and have to rinse it off as well as my finger tips. 

ObsessionÂ® is a potent and romantic perfume for evening. The prices of the assorted sizes of ObsessionÂ® range from forty to sixty dollars.

product_name: Mania by Giorgio Armani for Men 3.4 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: BEST COLOGNE EVAH!
review_text: I'm a cologne junkie, and of my vast collection, Armani Mania is clearly my #1.  I'm into my 3rd bottle of this potion, and it continues to bring on the compliments, and inquiries of "What's that cologne you're wearing, it smells fantastic!"  You cannot - repeat - CANNOT go wrong here.  A modern classic

product_name: Komenuka Bijin All-Natural Hair Care Set: Hair Shampoo & Hair Treatment / Conditioner: Beauty
title: Truly the Best!!
review_text: This is by far the best Shampoo and Conditioner set I have used.  I have very fine, very straight, and very long hair that breaks easily but not with this shampoo and conditioner.  This set makes it smooth, but not oily and so when I brush my hair there is no yanking going on.  My hair is noticeably more shiny and soft.  It has a very pleasant scent and it is all natural.  What a great way to pamper yourself!  Definitely worth the extra investment

product_name: Tocca Beauty Scented Candle: Beauty
title: Havana scent
review_text: I was a bit apprehensive to purchase a candle this expensive, but I was very pleased with the scent, clean burning, and look of the candle and the packaging it came in. The Havana is a scent that both my husband and I enjoyed

product_name: Mistral Shea Butter Soaps - 7 oz.: Beauty
title: LUSCIOUS AND LOVELY
review_text:
Mistral, as many know, is a powerful, gusty wind that blows across the south of France.  Mistral, as I was happy to discover,  is also the name of a line of bath and body products, all French inspired, all lusciously lovely from scented soaps to soothing lotions to rejuvenating body butters.

	Matthew Tilker, founder and president of Mistral,  utilizes Shea butter, which is an efficacious natural healer, in a myriad of must-have forms.  Derived  from the nuts of the African Shea Tree (according to sacred custom the nuts are  harvested primarily by women), this butter  is  highly emollient,  a boon for those with dry skin, chapped lips, any number of skin irritations.

	The pure Shea Butter soap comes in a plethora of inviting fragrances, all milled six times (while others boast being  triple milled).  South Seas is a particular favorite - it's as fresh as an ocean breeze and as calming, soothing as a tropical island.  The marine scent is accented with a touch of grapefruit, white flowers and soft woods.  An irresistible combination.

	South Seas is a fragrance with which you wish to surround yourself - made possible by the shower gel, body lotion, massage bath and body oil, bath salts and candle all available at very accessible prices.

	Highly recommended

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: If it worked for me, I believe it will work for you
review_text: The cream is great. It instantly gets absorbed  after application and i believe helps over time close up leakage of blood capilleries (which causes black circle appearences). I suffered from chronic dark circles. This cream after 1 month of application has considerably lightened my dark circles and has reduced puffiness. I would suggest anyone who is looking for an effective cream give this product a shot. considering my condition i still have light dark circles left and hope this cream will continue to benefit me. I still have doubts on this cream totally brightening my skin tone around my eyes, but never the less I find it effective

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: I would have paid so much more than $95....
review_text:
Through luck of genetics, I have dark circles. I've had them since as far back as I can remember. No amount of sleep, eat well, or generally good lifestyle choices changed my dark circles. 

I was pretty hesitant to try it out, since, woah... $95 is a lot of money, but I gave it a shot. I used it exactly per the instructions.

I was actually pretty discouraged because I didn't see a change, but then BAM, in the 3rd week of using it, I woke up and my circles were soooo much noticably lighter. I could cry. It's hard being so young and having dark circles under your eyes, but now I  look more my age. And I'm still only in the 3rd week, so I have a lot of hope for the product. 

I feel badly for the people who didn't get a reaction, but as they state in their pamphlet, it will not work on 100% of people. Like anything, really, won't work for 100% of people. 

But it worked for me, and I'm so very happy. I would have paid sooo much more for these results.

product_name: Bremenn Research Labs Hylexin(TM): Beauty
title: buy it
review_text: have had dark circles caused by pigmentation for four years and have tried everything.have been using hylexin for just five days and honestly its been amazing.i saw all the bad reviews and im glad they didnt stop me.for the first time in years i dont need a concealer.will continue to keep you posted as i hope in the nxt week or two not to have any circles at all.(if it continues this way) i think mayb the product doesnt work for hereditery circles

product_name: Avon ANEW RETROACTIVE+ 2-in-1 Cleanser: Beauty
title: Great Cleanser!!!!
review_text:
I love how this product works and feels on my skin!! Does an excellent job off removing makeup and cleaning the skin with out drying your skin out! Makes skin feel cool and clean!!

I have very sensitive skin an was concerned that this product was going to break my skin out OR be very drying because this product tones as well as cleanses the skin. But that  wasn't the case. My skin didn't break out, nor is this product drying. Highly recommend!

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: Better than Most!
review_text: I used this relaxer for the first time after using many brand name ones. I was impressed with the results. It leaft my hair with much needed moisture, and very shiny. I normally apply the realxer myself at home, but I choose to go professional to really capture the promises that this product states. The smell was not noticeable, which was good since most chemicals are so harsh and strong. It didn't burn my scalp like most have. The quantity was ample considering that most relaxers are cheap with the amount they give I think that it was worth the price! I'll be buying it again

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: Breaks the bank--but I'll never use another!
review_text: This is by far the most expensive relaxer I've ever used and it is worth every penny.  I first heard of it as being Oprah's relaxer so I decided to hunt it down.  One of the best things I've ever done.  I have very coarse, thick "horsehair" that usually defeats most over the counter perms after a few washings.  Not Phytospecific's relaxer.  My hair stayed soft AND STRAIGHT no matter what the weather or I did to it. And it's the healthiest it's ever been.  No other relaxer ever did that for my hair.  In fact they usually made it worse! I absolutely love the Phytorelaxer and I am officially addicted.  If it were less pricey, it would get 5 stars

product_name: Phyto Phytospecific Phytorelaxer Index 2 - Normal, Thick, Coarse Hair: Beauty
title: too pricey, but i wouldn't use anything else
review_text:
i'm black, have kinky hair, and i've been relaxing my hair for about 25 years. i've used many many types of relaxers to my dismay:- hair falling out, breaking, dry, etc.
so i let my hair "rest" for about 5 years then i tried the relaxer thing again after i found phyto. i've been doing my own hair now for about 1 year, and it's been great!- except for the price. my hair still feels as if it has life in it, it it is not breaking, it is not falling out. it burns like regular straightener. i use vinegar to neutralize it, then use the neutralizing shampoo with indicator to check for pink. please, there's not enough neutralizing shampoo to get rid of the staraightener.
the price is scary, but i'm more afraid of having my hair fall out and having to fix that. 
soon, i'll have to get a hairdresser though, because my hair has now been retaining it's length and growing - and it's harder to straighten it myself.

product_name: Dior Dior Logo Palette - Lips: Beauty
title: EASY TO MIX...SWEEEEET !!
review_text:
THIS IS NOT STICKY LIP GLOSS. 

THE ROSE TONE IS EASY TO WEAR .

IT'S SWEET AND NATURAL TONE. 

YOU CAN MIX COLORS AND THAN CREATE NEW COLOR ON YOUR LIPS !!

YOU DON'T NEED TO SHOP TONS OF GLOSSES AND LIP STICKS. 

THIS IS IT !   PLUS   THE PALETTE CASE IS CUTE

product_name: Un Jardin Sur Le Nil by Hermes 1.6 oz Eau de Toilette Spray: Beauty
title: Not Like Any Other Summer Scent
review_text:
I'm a big fan of "non-traditional" perfumes - I don't care for sweet floraly scents, and I have been known to poach my man's cologne occassionally, just to enjoy the scent all day. So if you like citrusy/woodsy scents, you MUST try this one - it has an unusual top note and dry-down that are hard to describe, but anyway it never fails to get compliments from men, and the "WHAT are you wearing?" from women.  

It's intense, but it's not overpowering the way some Orientals can be.  But it's also summery-light.  I can't explain it - just try it.  A couple of times.  And for something even more unusual, try Jardin Mediterrenne (sp?) also by Hermes - the only perfume I've ever given 5 stars

product_name: AVEDA Shampure Shampoo 8.5 fl oz/250 ml: Beauty
title: Love the Aveda Shampure shampoo & conditioner
review_text: I *love* this formula for my thick, naturally curly, slightly hilighted hair.  It does a great job cleaning without stripping, and this is the first conditioner that did a good job tackling my naturally curly hair without weighing it down.  I did get a good deal at my salon - $9 for the shampoo and a little more for the conditioner

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Best product for straight, shiny hair!
review_text: To tell you the truth, I have tried everything on my hair to take away the frizz.  Nothing really worked at all...but Biosilk is a miracle!  The first time  I tried it, I noticed a major difference in my hair.  Just add a little bit to your hair, and it will immediately smooth it out, adding shine and softness.  It will also not weigh your hair down or make it too greasy..just don't use that much of it.  I mostly use this with my flat-iron, and I get amazing results.  I happen to like the smell of it...it reminds me of being in a salon!  Try the shampoo and conditioner as well

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: You are lucky if you have discovered this product!
review_text: I have wavy and coarse hair and I have a whole lot of it. I use this product after shower on damp hair and then blow-dry. This product really works and makes my hair soft and silky and it gives the hair nice movement and makes it easy to style. My hairdresser who has similiar hair as mine recommended me this product and she said she loves it. I am very happy to find this product before wasting a lot of money on trying others that don't work. It is a bliss

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Excellent product!
review_text: My hair stylist first introduced me to this product a few years ago and I've used it ever since. It makes your hair really soft and shiny and even smells good. Just a little of biosilk goes a long way. Gets rid of the frizz and dryness and really improves the look and feel of your hair. I definitely reccomend it

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: I love it
review_text:
I was hooked on Sebastian's shine serum forever.  Then I switched to this after hearing all the rave reviews.  It makes it just as shiny as the Sebastian, but for my thick wavy hair, it is easier to apply.  I only need about a quarter size amount, way less than any other product.  It has a nice soft finish.  
So if you like Sebastian and Redkin's shine serums, you'll like this.  
I'm not going to go as far as to say it's a miracle worker.  It makes your hair shinier.  It helps a little with my frizz, but doesn't depouf.

product_name: Biosilk Silk Therapy: Beauty
title: Your hair will thank you
review_text: I have straight hair, but it is super-long and thick, past my waist, so I have problems combing it and keeping it smooth.  Biosilk is the best stuff I have found to detangle after washing, and keep my hair soft after it is dry.  I have tried everything else, and I mean everything, and nothing compares.  I'm so hooked I have bought it by the gallon, and believe me, that is not cheap!  It even smells great, it's not greasy, and it is fantastic for giving or receiving massages, too

product_name: H2O Plus Hand and Nail Cream - 8 oz: Beauty
title: I love this product!
review_text: This is truly one of the best hand and nail creams out there.  It is quickly absorbed and not at all greasy - I put some on before I walk out the door in the morning and again before bedtime and it has made a real difference in the softness of my hands and the health of my cuticles.  Hangnails have always been a problem for me but this product keeps them under control as long as I apply it regularly. Love it!

product_name: Lancome Definicils High Definition Mascara Black/Noir: Beauty
title: My favorite
review_text: I really like this mascara. I only gave it 4 because it is clumpy and I have to spend a little time with my eyelash comb getting the clumps out.  Otherwise, it is the only mascara that doesn't cause me to loose a ton of lashes.  Everything else from Estee Lauder, Bourjois to Great Lash causes me loose a lot of lashes.  I also like that if I cry, I don't wind up looking like a raccoon, it subtly melts away; no mess! It washes off easily with soap and water and is flexible, not flaky.

product_name: Lancome Definicils High Definition Mascara Black/Noir: Beauty
title: Absolutely the best!
review_text: I have been using mascara since I was a teenager and this is absolutely the best ever. Ocassionally I have read reviews about other 'fantastic' mascaras and strayed and tried them, only to be disappointed. Now I wouldn't even bother trying anything else even when given in free gift packs. I have very long fair eyelashes and use black.
